title: Learner Engagement Coordinator
description:
POSITION SUMMARY

The Learner Engagement Coordinator supports the onboarding and ongoing engagement of clients and their teams within the 10X Business Academy.  This role focuses on executing engagement plans, monitoring participation metrics, and maintaining proactive communication to ensure a positive learner experience.  The Coordinator partners closely with the Learner Success Manager to deliver consistent service, identify engagement risks early, and contribute to high client satisfaction and retention.



ABOUT CARDONE VENTURES

Our mission is to help business owners achieve their personal, professional, and financial goals through the growth of their businesses. We work in dozens of verticals and provide strategic business guidance through courses, live events, partnerships, and investments. Our core values are the backbone of our business and guide our hiring process: we are inspirational, accountable, transparent, disciplined, aligned, and results-oriented. This company operates nationally and is growing by the day.



SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE:

• Participation, course completion, and engagement metrics consistently meet or exceed benchmarks, demonstrating strong learner follow-through.

• Engagement gaps or client concerns are identified early and escalated appropriately, preventing negative impact on satisfaction or retention.

• Client records, tracking, and reporting are consistently accurate and timely, while the Coordinator demonstrates increasing ownership, confidence, and readiness for advancement to Learner Success Manager.



OBJECTIVES

• Support seamless onboarding of new clients and learners by coordinating orientation sessions, tracking setup completion, and ensuring timely follow-up communication.

• Monitor learner engagement metrics daily/weekly (course progress, participation, attendance, logins) and escalate risks to the Learner Success Manager.

• Maintain accurate and up-to-date client records in CRM and learning platforms.

• Conduct scheduled check-in calls and
 follow-ups using approved engagement frameworks.

• Execute engagement action plans developed by the Learner Success Lead.

• Identify disengagement patterns early and recommend proactive outreach strategies.

• Ensure client inquiries are responded to within established service-level timelines.

• Prepare client progress summaries and engagement reports for review by the Learner Success Lead.

• Coordinate scheduling of kick-off/accountability/coaching calls.

• Support accountability tracking by documenting team participation and milestone completion.

• Assist in renewal preparation by compiling engagement history and performance insights.

• Contribute to continuous improvement by documenting common learner challenges and recommending process enhancements.

• Uphold client confidentiality and data integrity standards.

• Demonstrate consistent adherence to communication and service quality standards.



COMPETENCIES

• Demonstrates patience, empathy, and professionalism in client interactions.

• Clear verbal and written communication in a global business environment.

• Follows structured workflows, checklists, and SOPs with accuracy.

• Builds rapport and trust with clients and learners.

• Consistently meets deadlines and follows through on commitments.

• Ability to interpret basic engagement metrics and recognize trends.

• Maintains high accuracy in documentation and reporting.

• Adjusts quickly to new systems, tools, and evolving processes.

• Works effectively with managers and cross-functional teams.

• Knows when to resolve independently and when to escalate.

• Effectively manages multiple client accounts simultaneously.

• Operates effectively in cross-border client relationships.

• Demonstrates willingness to learn coaching frameworks and client engagement strategies.

• Comfortable using CRM systems, online learning platforms, and productivity tools.



EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE

• Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Education, Communications, or related field preferred.

• 1–3 years of experience in customer service, account coordination, virtual support, BPO, or client-facing roles.

• Experience supporting global clients or working in remote environments is preferred.

• Familiarity with CRM systems and online learning platforms is an advantage.



PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS

• Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer



COMMITMENT TO DIVERSITY

As an equal opportunity employer committed to meeting the needs of a multigenerational and multicultural workforce, Cardone Ventures recognizes that a diverse staff, reflective of our community, is an integral and welcome part of a successful and ethical business. We hire local talent at all levels regardless of race, color, religion, age, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, or disability, and actively foster inclusion in all forms both within our company and across interactions with clients, candidates, and partners.



If this position caught your eye, send us your resume! For best consideration, please complete the online application form:


/

Excellent written English

title: TikTok Community Manager & Growth Specialist (USA Market)
description:
We are looking for a TikTok-focused Community Manager to lead the growth and management of our accounts targeting the United States market.



We are not looking for someone who simply posts content. We are looking for a strategic thinker with proven experience in organic TikTok growth and basic knowledge of TikTok Shop.



Our products are books targeted at young couples, and we will soon expand into journals and gratitude diaries.



This is a mid-to-long-term collaboration with real growth potential.





- Position Objective



Develop, manage, and scale TikTok accounts focused on the U.S. market with the goal of creating viral videos that drive organic traffic to 
 and increase book sales.





- Main Responsibilities



1) Creation and Management of TikTok Accounts (USA)

 • Create and manage TikTok accounts targeting the U.S. market.

 • Operate within a proper technical setup for the USA market (VPN with static IP (we will provide it) and a dedicated mobile device used exclusively for these accounts).

 • Post content daily.

 • Continuously optimize profile, bio, links, and call-to-actions.

 • TikTok will be the primary platform.

 • Instagram or
 may be used as secondary distribution channels.





2) Strategic Content Publishing & Management

 • Publish content following the creative guidelines we provide.

 • Adapt content to current TikTok USA trends and algorithm changes.

 • Schedule and manage posts using Metricool (or other tool)

 • Analyze performance metrics (retention, engagement, conversion) and propose continuous improvements.

 • Suggest new content ideas based on market trends.



3) Content Creation

 • Publish both photo-based and video content.

 • We can provide product photos and creative assets.

 • You may also generate original content (including AI-assisted content when appropriate).

 • Ideally, we would send you physical copies of the books to improve content creation (logistics to be discussed).

 • Propose new formats tailored to the niche.

 • Adapt trends to our target audience.





4) Affiliate & Creator Outreach (TikTok Shop)

 • Continuously identify U.S.-based micro-creators and affiliates.

 • Reach out and manage collaborations.

 • Manage UGC campaigns.

 • Build and maintain a creator database.

 • Analyze the ideal customer avatar.

 • Identify trends within the niche.

 • Ensure affiliates properly tag our products in TikTok Shop.





5) Ideal Profile

 • Proven experience growing TikTok accounts, especially in the U.S. market.

 • Strategic mindset and results-driven approach.

 • Ability to work independently.

 • Familiarity with tools such as Metricool or similar social media management platforms.

 • Strong communication and weekly reporting skills.

 • Proactive attitude and genuine interest in continuous improvement.

 • Include the word “rocket” in your proposal to confirm that you have read this job description carefully.

 • This is initially a part-time position, but responsibilities may expand as we grow.

 • If you already have a mobile device (ideally an iPhone) that you can use for the U.S. market, that is a plus.



6) Work Volume

 • Initially managing 3 TikTok accounts (corresponding to 3 books).

 • Potential expansion as we launch new products.

 • We are a growing brand, so this is an ongoing collaboration, not a short-term project.





7) Compensation

 • $300 per month for 20 hours per week.

 • Performance-based bonuses tied to growth and results.





8) Please include in your proposal:

 • Your specific experience managing TikTok accounts in the U.S.

 • Results achieved (if possible, with examples).

 • Your weekly availability.

title: URGENT - Experienced QuickBooks Desktop Migration and Quickbooks Online Bookkeeper / Accountant Needed
description:
This is an URGENT OPENING we need to fill, and we will be aggressively looking through every application the same day we receive it. 



We are a full-service bookkeeping, accounting, tax, and CFO advisory services firm that is operated almost exclusively by our amazing team in the Philippines. Our focus is on optimizing how our clients use QuickBooks Online (QBO) so we can provide them with financial analytics and dashboards on a recurring basis to help their businesses thrive. Often we have clients  using QuickBooks desktop, wanting to migrate over to QuickBooks Online. Our firm is experiencing much more demand than we can handle, so we need to hire more bookkeepers to manage the onboarding, QBD Migrations, QBO cleanup, and daily bookkeeping needs of our clients.



COMPANY CULTURE:



We are a vibrant and supportive company. When you speak with our staff in the Philippines, you’ll find that we treat our team with respect and genuinely care for each member. Unlike many other firms, we recognize and value our international tea
mbers as client-facing experts. Your insights and contributions are not only welcomed but are essential to our growth and success.



We want someone who is fun to work with, has a positive attitude, is caring and kind to others in our team, is highly self-directed, highly organized, and has a very high standard for themselves. We also want someone who is willing to receive feedback and looking to continually improve so they can be a part of our team in 5 years, 10 years and even longer term.



What sets Simple Financials apart is our commitment to our team’s well-being and professional development. You are more important than the client; if a client disrespects you, we will prioritize your well-being over their business. Our culture is built on mutual respect, flexibility, and a genuine interest in helping each tea
mber achieve their personal and professional goals. We listen to your feedback and work together to create a supportive and enriching work environment.



COMPANY AND STAFF BENEFITS:



• Flexible Work Schedule: During your first three months of Onboarding and Training, it is suggested you come in during CST work hours to maximize your exposure to our company culture and get the training you need to perform at and above expectations. After successfully completing your Onboarding and Training phase, other than the team and client meetings scheduled in CST, you're free to work during your preferred hours.



• Health Insurance Reimbursement: We will reimburse part of your monthly PhilHealth and Social Security System payments for $30 monthly.



• Paid Time Off (PTO): You will start earning vacation leave credits the day you start working at Simple Financials. These leave credits accrue with worked hours, and by working 40 hours per week for the entire year, you will earn:



   - 15 days of vacation leave credits per year for the first two years

   - 18 days of vacation leave credits per year during your years 3 and 4

   - 21 days of vacation leave credits per year after 5 years of tenure



• Paid Holidays: Simple Financials observes specific US holidays. On these days, you will get holiday pay equal to your regular number of hours per day:



• Independence Day (July 4),

• Thanksgiving Day (every 4th Thursday in November),

• Christmas Eve (December 24),

• Christmas Day (December 25),

• New Year’s Day (January 01), and

• New Year’s Eve (December 31)

• Easter Monday (Monday after Easter Sunday)



• Profit Sharing Program: Recently, we have introduced a profit-sharing program for all eligible staff members once they have completed the training and onboarding period. Candidates may also be eligible for profit sharing after 1 year of working with us.



• Company Retreats: To foster employee engagement, we organize in-person retreats or outings that also strengthen camaraderie among our tea
mbers. These usally occur two to three times per year.



• Ad Hoc Bonuses: Periodically, we give bonuses for personal milestones such as Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, etc.



• Advancement, Growth, and Leadership: As we acquire more companies, you will have long-term growth potential for advanced roles and learning. Over the next 3-5 years, the successful applicant would progress in their role with more strategically-focused responsibilities and potentially manage a team of bookkeepers at higher compensation ranging from $30,000 USD (1.7M Philippine pesos) to $40,000 USD (2.25M Philippine pesos) annually.



THE IDEAL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE MOST OF THE FOLLOWING EXPERIENCE:



- Successfully converted companies from QuickBooks Desktop (QBD) to QuickBooks Online (QBO)

- Reconcile, update and create reports from the Quickbooks Desktop ecosystem 

- Reviewing a client's QBO Bookkeeping to point out issues and inaccuracies.

- Cleaning up messy, inaccurate, and unreconciled books in QBO.

- Creating Journal Entries, monthly, quarterly, and annually for things like payroll, depreciation, amortization, etc.

- Categorizing and matching transactions daily and weekly in the banking section.

- Creating invoices, sales receipts, credit memos, expenses, purchase orders and bills in QBO.

- Accurately using Locations, Classes and Tags in QBO for better reporting.

- Monthly reconciliations to ensure accuracy.

- Knowledge of advanced reporting features.

- Strong proficiency creating financial models in Excel and Google Sheets.

- Strong proficiency in visualizing data with charts and graphs in Excel and Google Sheets.



OTHER REQUIREMENTS:



- Great written and spoken English

- Timely and professional
 etiquette

- High-speed internet and a reliable computer

- Professional camera & microphone

- A quiet space to have confidential and professional conversations with clients



COMPENSATION:



The position will include a three-month training and onboarding period, which will be compensated at $6 to $7 USD per hour (based upon experience and skills) for the first three months. After this period, compensation will increase by $1 to $2 USD per hour (projected around to $7 to $9 USD per hour for the next nine months of working under the current management to advance in their role (more time if needed). 



After a year of working with our company, compensation will increase to $9 to $12 per hour USD, based upon performance and experience, with annual promotions and raises to follow, and can be higher given your level of success in the position.



Plus, all the benefits mentioned above!



TO APPLY:



This is an URGENT OPENING we need to fill, and we will be aggressively looking through every application the same day we receive it. 



If you are ready to apply, please copy-pasting the link below and follow all the listed steps, including uploading a resume, filling out the application and answering the questions about your skills and experience: 







Please Note: It is best to have already taken your English Proficiency Assessment on your Onlinejobs.ph profile through 
 and the IQ Test through 
 before applying since we will request both of these in the application process. It is not mandatory to have them completed but it will improve your chances of moving along in the process.



The last round will be an interview with some of my other tea
mbers in the Philippines and an interview with me. Then we will make our final decision.

title: Full-time Google Ads role GA4/GTM Tracking Experience
description:
Full-Time | $7.50/hour | Weekdays | UK Timezone (9am–5pm)



I’m hiring a Google Ads Campaign Builder who lives for clean builds: tight structure, correct settings, strong conversion tracking, and launch-ready accounts. Most of our work comes from Fiverr setup projects, so campaign setup is the core deliverable. Ongoing management/optimisation exists, but it’s secondary.



Work hours: Mon–Fri, 9:00–5:00 UK time



**The mission**



Ship high-quality Google Ads builds and tracking setups fast, with zero sloppy tracking and clean handoffs so accounts perform from day one.



**Your core responsibilities (80% setup)**

1) Google Ads campaign builds (primary)



Build and launch campaigns (Search, PMax; Display/Remarketing when needed)



Keyword research and campaign architecture (tight themes, clear intent mapping)



Ad groups, ads, assets/extensions, audiences, locations, schedules



Correct bidding + budget setup based on goal (leads/eCom) and conversion signal readiness



Pre-launch QA checklist (settings, brand exclusions where needed, geo intent, networks, conversions, URLs, tracking templates)



2) Tracking implementation & validation (primary)



Set up and troubleshoot GTM + GA4



Configure conversion tracking (forms, calls, purchases, lead events)



Validate conversions end-to-end (test submissions, deduping, attribution sanity checks)



Fix common issues: missing params, duplicates, incorrect event firing, consent mode issues where relevant



**Secondary responsibilities (20% management)**



Light optimisation after launch (search terms + negatives, basic asset improvements, quick wins)



Performance notes for handoff / next steps



Support troubleshooting on active accounts as needed



**Requirements**



You’ve built many Google Ads accounts from scratch (not just “managed”)



Strong GA4 + GTM setup/debugging



You can produce clean, documented builds that another buyer can pick up



You work fast without sacrificing QA



You communicate blockers early



Nice to have: Shopify/Woo tracking, CallRail, Looker Studio, Meta Ads



**How to apply (mandatory)**



30-sec intro video: who you are + what you build best

title: Short-term Rental Operation Manager
description:
Summary



Zen Living Short-term Rentals is looking for Operation Manager. We are a short-term rental management company that manages over 150 listings in the US, Canada, and more. We are looking for Airbnb/short-term rental experts to join our team to provide good guest experience and represent the best interest of our owner partners. This role requires expert knowledge on Airbnb and the individual needs to be super responsive with strong reasoning skills to fill in 12-hour shifts for 3-4 days a week. 



Duties



Guest Communication:



- Prompt responses: Respond to guest messages within 5 minutes (With AI’s help), even faster with urgent issues (Look for messages from Airbnb, VRBO, [BookingD0tcom],
, Text, Whatsapp groups, Openphone)

- Issue Resolution: Be resourceful in trying to find a resolution to guest questions or issues

- Follow-up: Keep a list of ongoing issues including guest special requests, maintenance issues, and refund issues, and keep reporting to the management team and owners

- Reservation Alterations: Handle reservation alterations as needed.

- Resolution Center: Manage extra fees and follow up on resolutions.

- Eviction:  Ask guests to leave if broken house rules or late check-outs



Airbnb Support Communication:



- Review Disputes: Handle disputes related to guest reviews.

- Airbnb Cases: Communicate and resolve issues with Airbnb support.



Owner communication



- Promptly coordinate between owner, company management team, and other service providers

- Answer owner questions using our SOP guidlines and previous Airbnb knowledge



Other:



- Call local police for assistance in eviction

- Research and find local service providers such as cleaners, plumbers etc

- Quick edits on listing descriptions and auto messages

- Help transition to the next shift and point out key things to follow up

- Write reviews and encourage reviews for various platform

- Coordinate with service vendors such as cleaner, plumber as needed



Softwares we use:



- Hospitable

- Open Phone

- Google Suite

- WhatsApp

- WeChat

- Airbnb

- VRBO

- [BookingD0tcom]

- Pricelabs

- Host Buddy AI



QUALIFICATIONS:



- Exclusive Commitment: MUST WORK EXCLUSIVELY FOR MY COMPANY

- Preferred Experience: Experience as an Airbnb Support Ambassador or Airbnb Case Manager is preferred.

- Software: Experience with VRBO, [BookingD0tcom], Hospitable, Hostbuddy AI is a plus

- Work Hours: Must willing to work 12-hour-shift in front of the computer with a focus for at least 3 days a week

- Internet: Must have a stable high-speed internet connection and a contingency plan for backup.

- Work Environment: Must work in a quiet environment with a stable signal

- Language Skills: Proficient in English with excellent communication skills. Chinese is preferred.

title: Customer Service & Operations Coordinator (E-commerce – Paper Straight)
description:

 and support platforms in fluent English

* Maintain and update Excel / Google Sheets for tracking orders, complaints, and KPIs

* Act as the main communication point between:

    * External customer service team

    * Fulfillment center

    * Internal team

* Strong communication and coordination skills



Nice to Have (Preferred Skills)

* Experience working with Shopify stores

* Experience working with fulfillment centers / logistics coordination

* Experience supervising external CS teams

* Understanding of returns, chargebacks, and shipping workflows

* Process improvement mindset

* KPI tracking experience

* Familiar with SOP documentation

* Experience with Slack / Notion / ClickUp or similar tools



Soft Skills We Value

* Reliability and ownership mindset

* Structured thinker

* Calm under pressure

* Problem solver

* Attention to detail

* Fast learner

* Clear communicator

* Accountability



What Success Looks Like

* Fast response times

* Clean and organized case management

* Strong communication between teams

* Reduced customer complaints

* Clear reporting and visibility on issues



Position Details

* Remote (Full-time)

* Long-term position

* Growth opportunity inside a fast-scaling fashion brand



If this sounds like you, please apply and include:

1. Your customer service experience (e-commerce preferred)

title: Systems Coordinator
description:
Position Overview:  



The Systems Coordinator is responsible for creating, managing, and troubleshooting automation workflows in GoHighLevel (GHL) to support efficient operations across the company. This role requires at least one year of hands-on experience in GHL or a similar automation platform, along with strong analytical and problem-solving skills. In addition to system automation, this person will assist the Admin Operations Team with various ad hoc tasks and continuously seek opportunities to optimize workflows, eliminate inefficiencies, and enhance team productivity. 



 



Pay Range: $8 per hourwith a performance review scheduled after 90 days of employment. We believe in rewarding exceptional talents. 



 



About Power Plus Systems: 



Power Plus Systems, LLC has been a dominant force in the residential electrical contracting industry for two decades, and we continue to lead the way. Our vision is to successfully wire 28,000 homes to completion by the year 2029, ensuring safe and efficient electrical solutions, thereby making a positive impact on the lives of our customers and communities. At Power Plus Systems, LLC, a position with us isn't just a job; it's an opportunity to grow and develop within a company that genuinely appreciates your contributions and dedication to our shared mission. 



 



Objectives: 



Build, maintain, and troubleshoot automation workflows in GoHighLevel to support streamlined operations. 



Monitor performance of active automations to ensure accuracy, functionality, and timely resolution of system issues. 



Work closely with the Operations Manager to understand workflow needs and translate them into effective and efficient automations, while coordinating with Admin Operations and other departments as needed. 



Identify inefficiencies in current processes and proactively recommend workflow improvements. 



Assist the Admin Operations Team with various administrative and operational tasks, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. 



Troubleshoot and resolve Admin Operations Help Tickets with a customer-service–focused approach. 



Manage and update pipelines, triggers, automations, forms, and integrations as needed. 



Ensure all GHL data, workflows, and configurations are maintained accurately and consistently. 



 



Competencies: 



Strong understanding of automation logic, workflows, and pipeline management. 



High attention to detail to ensure accurate configuration and troubleshooting of automation sequences. 



Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to identify system gaps and propose solutions. 



Strong written and verbal communication skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. 



Proficiency in GoHighLevel or similar automation platforms (HubSpot, Zapier, Make, Zoho, ActiveCampaign, etc.). 



Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environment. 



Proactive mindset with a drive for continuous improvement. 



Customer service orientation when supporting internal stakeholders. 



 



Equipment Requirements: 



Must own a reliable computer or laptop capable of handling administrative tasks efficiently. 



High-speed internet connection to support video calls, cloud-based collaboration, and remote work. 



 



Education and Experience: 



At least one year of hands-on experience with GoHighLevel or similar automation platforms. 



Experience in operations, administrative support, or systems management is a plus. 



Familiarity with CRM logic, automation mapping, or workflow design is strongly preferred. 



 



Physical Requirements: 



Extended periods of sitting at a desk and working on a computer. 



 



Benefits: 



Growth opportunities in a well-established company. 



Ongoing training and professional development opportunities. 



Opportunity for advancement within the company. 



A supportive and collaborative work environment. 



Company-observed paid United States holidays (full time). 



Paid vacation. 



 



How to Apply: 



If you are ready to join Power Plus Systems, LLC, a well-established residential electrical contractor that values its tea
mbers and offers excellent benefits, please submit your application through the link below. 




/internationalform 



Power Plus Systems, LLC is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applicants from all backgrounds to apply. 



Join us at Power Plus Systems, LLC, and be part of our continued success as we embark on the next 20 years of excellence in residential electrical contracting!

description:

We are a growing Amazon arbitrage business looking for an experienced Online Arbitrage VA to join us full-time. This is not an entry-level position. You need to know how to find profitable products, read Keepa graphs, and work independently without hand-holding.



Daily Responsibilities

Source 7–10 profitable leads per day

Analyze every product using SellerAmp and Keepa before submitting

Check sales rank, Buy Box trends, price history, and competition

Calculate ROI and net profit accurately on every lead

Avoid gated, hazmat, IP complaint, and brand restricted products

Submit leads using our tracking system daily





Sourcing Criteria — Non-Negotiable

Minimum 25% ROI

Minimum $3.00 net profit per unit

Sales rank under 100,000 in main category

Buy Box must be winnable — no Amazon dominance

Zero IP or brand complaint risk





Requirements

Minimum 1 year Amazon OA sourcing experience

Must be proficient in SellerAmp and Keepa — no exceptions

Available during US business hours

Reliable internet and dedicated work computer





How to Apply — You MUST Submit All 4 Items

title: Clips Coordinator - Marketing Team
description:
Attention, Rockstars! We’re looking for a full-time Clips Coordinator. This role is responsible for reviewing raw video content and identifying key segments for short-form and long-form video production. This role is essential in curating compelling content that aligns with the company’s storytelling and branding efforts. The selected clips are supplied to the Virality Engineer for quality assessment and final approval before production.



Responsibilities:

Review raw video footage and identify engaging 
nts for content creation.

Timestamp and categorize video segments for short-form and long-form edits.

Collaborate closely with the Marketing Director to determine the viability of selected content, upcoming and current projects.

Ensure thorough content review and maximize the use of available footage.

Maintain and organize content using the Asana Video Project Board.

Assist in repurposing content for multiple platforms, including TikTok, YouTube, and marketing campaigns.

Work alongside other marketing units such as Graphic Design and Social Media to support content strategy.

Track and update project progress, ensuring deadlines are met.

Maintain proper organization of raw assets in designated storage locations.



Qualifications/Requirements:

Strong understanding of VIDEO CONTENT and storytelling techniques.

Ability to work collaboratively with various teams.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Experience using project management tools (e.g., Asana) preferred.

Knowledge of digital marketing and social media trends is a plus.



Our Purpose:

To develop and market products that help individuals to grow in multiple facets in life.

To Increase awareness and skill sets for the public we serve.

To make a significant difference in the quality of life of people not reaching their potential and those often left behind.

To produce and develop Millionaire closers.



By applying, you will show that you are committed to being a SUCCESS, and your success is important to us. I believe in supporting our clients and helping associates achieve their financial goals.



The position is Full-Time (remote) between the hours of 8:00AM - 5:00PM Pacific Standard Time, Monday through Friday.



About Mike Barron & Limelight Media LLC:

My name is Mike Barron and I am the founder of Limelight Media, a leading online coaching and sales training academy. Many of our students are seeking career change and or looking to acquire high-ticket skill sets so as to achieve career advancement and financial freedom. We are leaders in the online coaching industry and have receipts of multiple “Two Comma Club” Awards.



I'm really active on social media (Check out my IG and 
 and "influence" is a cornerstone of our operation. We create daily content, record coaching calls, case studies, short films, etc... The culture is fast-paced, raw, and fun... I was a former school President in my last job in 2013, and let's just say I'm Far (far) removed from that corporate-type environment. You can learn more about our community here: 
/watch?v=LdqINft4osw&t=75s.



A CULTURE LIKE NO OTHER!

Limelight Media has a culture like no other! Our mission is to spread positivity and create an uplifting environment for all of our employees. We offer a Disneyland-like experience for everyone we engage with - employees, students, business partners and anyone else we come into contact with. At our facility you will find a fun atmosphere that consists of energetic employees, arcade games, basketball hoops, food and drinks, 85 inch TVs and more! Come be a part of something great!!!



Limelight Media offers many packages that teach personal awareness, sales techniques, skills to become a master closer, and how to become the best version of yourself!



Limelight Media LLC is an equal opportunity employer. All aspects of employment including the decision to hire, promote, discipline, or discharge, will be based on merit, competence, performance, and business needs. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, marital status, age, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy, genetic information, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law.



For faster processing, please
 us your portfolio at 
 (
). Include the job title in the subject line. Thank you.

title: Content Specialist & Video Editor
description:
Do you love video editing and want to grow your career in content creation?



We're looking for talented video editors who are ready to take on a bigger role as a Content Specialist.



In this role, you'll do more than just editing. You’ll be trained on our internal systems to create short-form captions using AI, schedule social media posts through our platform, and manage content workflows for your assigned client.



We are a content agency, and we often repurpose longer-form videos for YouTube Shorts, Reels, and TikToks, as well as audiograms and graphics for social media. We also edit their raw videos for YouTube and edit podcast episodes as well.



What You’ll Be Doing:



Edit short-form and long-form content (YouTube, Reels, TikTok, podcasts)

Use our AI captioning system to create short-form captions

Schedule content to automatically post inside our proprietary platform

Follow creative direction and provide consistent, high-quality execution

Participate in weekly training sessions to continually improve your skills



Who We’re Looking For:



Professional experience with Adobe Premiere, After Effects, or similar tools

Strong eye for motion design and storytelling

Organized, detail-oriented, and able to manage your time independently

Positive attitude and willingness to receive feedback

Excellent communication skills and a self-starter mindset

Comfortable learning new tools and systems



What We Offer:



Guaranteed client placement upon successful training

Monthly salary of $700 to $1,000 USD paid directly by the client

Weekly training and ongoing support

100% remote work



If you're interested, please respond with the subject line "It's Me You're Looking For" and include a link to your work. Tell me why we should hire you!

title: Digital PR outreach and Media relationships
description:
Digital PR Pitch Specialist:



We're looking for a dynamic and tenacious Digital PR Pitch Specialist to join our team. You'll be the driving force behind securing high-quality online media coverage and backlinks, responsible for crafting compelling pitches and building relationships with journalists, bloggers, and influencers across various digital platforms. If you thrive on making connections and landing impactful placements, this role is for you!



In this role, you will:



Creative content and pitch ideation



Develop and execute strategic outreach campaigns to secure earned media placements and high-authority backlinks.



Identify and cultivate relationships with key online journalists, editors, bloggers, and social media influencers.



Craft highly personalized and compelling pitches that resonate with media targets and align with our clients' objectives.



Create press release and find journalists
s.



Negotiate and manage content placements, ensuring brand messaging and SEO value are maximized.

Highly organized with a keen eye for detail and the ability to manage multiple campaigns simultaneously.

title: Senior Graphic Designer with Modern Skill with AI Prompting Master Skils and proven experience with Amazon
description:
ABOUT US



Since 2013, Prodigy Media has built more than brands — we've created an Amazon-native empire. With 12 years of proven success and 28+ product lines under our belt, we don't play small. Our mission? Launch culturally resonant, design-led, emotionally sticky products that dominate Amazon and beyond.



Now, we're leveling up — and we want a design assassin who’s mastered AI workflows, commands Midjourney like a wizard, and turns prompts into visual gold.



WHO WE WANT



This is not your average graphic design role. We're looking for a hybrid Creative Director / Prompt Engineer / Graphic Design savant who can:



Think like a marketer. Design like an artist. Prompt like an AI god.



You’ll own the visual storytelling for our brands, using both traditional tools and bleeding-edge AI systems to pump out Amazon-optimized assets that convert.



WHAT YOU’LL DO



Craft Ultra-High-Converting Amazon Ads – static, lifestyle, 
-tier, and scroll-stopping. Own A+ Content Design – full module execution with story arcs that build obsession. Design Labels & Packaging – pixel-perfect, regulatory-ready, and unforgettable on the shelf. Prompt, Edit & Produce AI-Generated Visuals – using tools like Midjourney, DALL•E, Runway, Spline, Veo3, Sora, and others. Run 3D Product Renders – via Blender, KeyShot, or AI-powered 3D tools. Develop Scroll-Hook Videos – using After Effects, Premiere, Runway AI, etc.



Systematize Brand Visuals Across 30+ Products – while keeping it all aligned, emotional, and conversion-focused.



WHO YOU ARE



5+ years in design, at least 2+ years in Amazon/e-commerce brand creative

Fluent in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Blender, After Effects

Pro-level Midjourney / AI prompt engineer – this is non-negotiable

Obsessed with Amazon visual psychology, packaging psychology, and design that sells

Able to juggle 10 brands and still hit deadlines

Operate with a Creative Director mindset — not just execution, but strategy

Bonus: Experience creating creative systems, art direction templates, or leading a team



MUST-HAVES

Portfolio with Amazon ads, A+ pages, labels, 3D renders, videos, and AI-gen examples

Real-world use of AI tools integrated into your workflow

Available Mon-Fri 5:00am–2:00pm PST

title: Social Media Virtual Assistant
description:
Here’s a quick video sharing why you may want to work with me! 
 



Role Overview:

I’m looking for a proactive, highly organized Social Media Virtual Assistant to become a key partner in managing the day-to-day content operations of my business. In this full-time role, you’ll take ownership of executing and organizing social media content across multiple platforms, handling content creation and video editing, uploading and publishing posts, and maintaining content calendars so I can stay focused on high-priority initiatives. You’ll be responsible for keeping content flowing smoothly, ensuring brand consistency, tracking performance metrics, and proactively managing weekly workflows with minimal oversight. This role is ideal for someone who thrives on structure, enjoys behind-the-scenes execution, and wants to grow long-term as an integral part of a values-driven, high-performing team.



Requirements:

*Must be able to work US hours. 

*Strong written and verbal communication

*Highly organized, detail-oriented, proactive, and able to manage multiple priorities independently.



What You’ll Do:



Must-Have Experience (Responsibilities You Must Be Proficient In)



These are the tasks the VA needs to handle independently and confidently from day one:



Social Media Management:

*Schedule and publish content across platforms such as Instagram,
, TikTok, LinkedIn, and YouTube

*Write, edit, and proofread captions, hashtags, and post descriptions

*Ensure posts are published on time and aligned with content calendars

*Monitor comments, messages, and notifications; flag or respond as directed



Content Creation & Organization:

*Handle content creation and video editing for social media platforms

*Create content assets, including graphic design and short-form video edits

*Organize content assets (videos, graphics, captions) in shared folders

*Take long-form video content and repurpose it into short-form formats such as Reels, Shorts, posts, and stories

*Ensure brand voice, formatting, and posting guidelines are followed



Content Calendar Management:

*Create, set up, maintain, and update content calendars as needed

*Align publishing schedules across platforms to ensure consistent posting



YouTube Management & Optimization:

*Manage YouTube content, including uploading videos, writing captions/descriptions, and adding tags

*Create and optimize YouTube titles, descriptions, thumbnails, and metadata

*Apply YouTube optimization (SEO) to improve visibility and discoverability

*Ensure YouTube content aligns with brand voice and content strategy



Analytics & Reporting:

*Track performance metrics and analytics (reach, engagement, views, clicks)

*Prepare weekly or monthly performance summaries

*Identify top-performing content and engagement trends



Nice-to-Have Experience (Responsibilities You Can Learn Over Time)



These tasks are valuable but can be trained on the job:



*Support paid ad setup, monitoring, or reporting (Meta Ads, YouTube Ads)

*Community management and engagement strategies

*Basic video editing (reels, shorts, captions, thumbnails)

*Canva design for social media graphics and templates

*Influencer outreach or collaboration coordination

*SEO optimization for social captions, YouTube titles, and descriptions

*Assisting with content strategy planning and campaign execution

*Knowledge and familiarity with AI tools for content creation, research, analytics, or workflow optimization



Ready to Apply?

1. Message me with the subject “I am your Social Media Virtual Assistant!”

2. Add a link to your resume

3. Indicate your contact
 address



If this doesn’t sound perfect but you love hard work and learning, reach out anyway—there’s likely another chance to join my team!

title: Professional Services Engineer (SASE & Borderless WAN)
description:
Professional Services Engineer (SASE & Borderless WAN)

Remote | Full-Time 



Role Overview



We are hiring a Professional Services Engineer to lead complex SASE transformations for enterprise environments. This is not a support role — this is an architecture-led implementation position.



You will own the end-to-end deployment lifecycle of Borderless SD-WAN (BWAN) and ZTNA Next solutions, guiding customers from legacy MPLS or first-generation SD-WAN into a converged, software-defined, zero-trust WAN architecture.



You will operate as the technical authority across multi-site, multi-cloud deployments.



Key Responsibilities



• Lead execution of BWAN Deployment Packages across up to 20 sites (8 Hubs / 12 Spokes typical)

• Conduct discovery workshops and define migration strategy from MPLS or Gen-1 SD-WAN to Borderless WAN

• Design and implement overlay/underlay routing fabrics using BGP and OSPF

• Deploy unified SASE client integrating Endpoint SD-WAN and SSE

• Configure Assured AppX to maintain QoE for latency-sensitive applications (Zoom, RingCentral, VoIP, video)

• Implement ZTNA Next Layer 3 Edge for server-initiated and bi-directional flows

• Launch and automate SASE Gateways across AWS, Azure, and GCP

• Produce High-Level Design (HLD) and As-Built documentation

• Deliver structured knowledge transfer sessions to ensure operational readiness



Required Technical Expertise



• Deep hands-on SD-WAN experience (branch to data center scale)

• Strong routing foundation (BGP, OSPF, overlay/underlay segmentation)

• Experience with traffic steering, policy-based routing, and dynamic path remediation

• Security service chaining to Cloud Firewalls, SWG, CASB, DLP

• Experience designing context-aware access policies using device posture and risk signals

• Experience replacing manual CLI workflows with automation-driven operations



Professional Profile



• Comfortable leading architecture discussions with Network Architects

• Able to communicate business impact (ROI, uptime, resiliency) to Infrastructure Executives

• Experienced delivering projects within defined 12–18 week implementation windows

• Structured, documentation-driven, and delivery-oriented



Success in This Role



You will move customers from fragmented network silos into a unified SASE fabric where security and performance follow the user from branch to home to cloud.



Qualifications



• 5+ years in enterprise networking, SD-WAN, or SASE implementations

• Proven experience leading multi-site rollouts

• Multi-cloud networking exposure (AWS, Azure, GCP)

• Strong troubleshooting and architectural problem-solving capability



Application Instructions



Please submit:

1. Updated CV (PDF)

2. 3–5 bullet points summarizing your SASE or SD-WAN deployment experience

3. Sample architecture you’ve implemented (brief description acceptable)

4. Expected monthly rate or salary

5. Notice period or availability



---

Thank you for your interest. While we carefully review each submission, we will only be able to contact candidates who are shortlisted.

title: AI Operations & Social Media Manager (Virtual Assistant)
description:
Position: AI Operations & Social Media Manager

Company: EasyTaxesOnline

Location: Remote (Anywhere — U.S. time zone overlap required)

Hours: 35-40 hours/week

Type: Contract / Long-term



ABOUT EASYTAXESONLINE

EasyTaxesOnline is a modern tax preparation and financial services company with 20+ years of expertise. We help individuals and businesses with expert tax preparation, credit optimization, business formation, funding readiness, and financial education. We're based in Las Vegas and serve clients nationwide.

We recently rebranded and are launching an aggressive social media and marketing campaign. We need someone to manage our AI-powered content creation and social media operations so our founder can focus on tax preparation and business strategy.



THE ROLE

You will be the AI Operations Manager and Social Media Manager for EasyTaxesOnline. This is NOT a traditional social media role — you'll be using AI tools extensively to create, manage, and publish content at scale.

You will manage:



AI content generation tools (image, video, copy)

Social media scheduling and publishing

Community engagement (replies, DMs, comments)

Brand quality control

Basic analytics and reporting



You will NOT be responsible for:



Creating all content from scratch manually

Developing overall business strategy

Managing paid advertising (initially)

Customer service or sales





WHAT YOU'LL DO DAILY

Content Creation (using AI tools):



Generate social media graphics, carousels, and images using AI design tools

Create short-form video content using AI video tools

Create and manage AI avatar/clone videos for promotional content

Write captions and copy using AI writing assistants

Edit and refine AI outputs to match brand guidelines

Ensure all content meets our brand standards before publishing



Social Media Management:



Schedule and publish 25-45 posts/day across 5 platforms

Manage Instagram,
, LinkedIn, X/Twitter, and TikTok

Post Stories (10-12/day Instagram, 6-8/day
)

Monitor comments and DMs — respond or escalate as needed

Engage with relevant accounts to grow our presence



Quality Control:



Review all AI-generated content against brand guidelines

Ensure correct colors, fonts, messaging, and tone

Flag anything that needs founder approval

Maintain content calendar and asset organization



Reporting:



Track basic metrics (followers, engagement, reach)

Weekly summary of performance

Note what's working and what's not





WEEKLY VOLUME

This is a high-volume role. Here's what you'll manage:



X/Twitter: 7-10 posts per day (49-70 per week)

Instagram: 2 feed posts + 2-3 Reels + 10-12 Stories per day (98-119 pieces per week)

: 2 feed posts + 6-8 Stories per day (56-70 pieces per week)

LinkedIn: 2 posts per day (14 per week)

TikTok: 5-6 posts per day (35-42 per week)



Total:
+ pieces of content per week



This is achievable with AI tools — but you must be comfortable working with AI and moving quickly.



REQUIREMENTS

Must Have:



2+ years experience managing social media accounts (business, not personal)

Hands-on experience with AI tools for content creation

Strong written English (captions, replies, engagement)

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision

Reliable internet and computer setup

Available during U.S. business hours (at least 4-5 hour overlap with Pacific Time)



Experience We're Looking For:



Managing multiple social media platforms simultaneously

Using AI to generate images, graphics, or designs

Using AI to generate or edit written content

Creating AI avatars/clones for video content

Scheduling tools and content calendars

Working with brand guidelines and style guides





APPLICATION QUESTIONS (Required)

Please answer ALL of the following in your application. Applications without answers will not be considered.



1. AI Tools Experience

List ALL the AI tools you have used for work (not just heard of). For each tool, briefly describe what you used it for and how often.

Categories to address:

     AI image/graphic generation tools

     AI video generation tools

     AI avatar/clone creation tools

     AI copywriting/text tools

     AI design tools

     Any other AI tools



Example format:

"[Tool Name] — Used for [purpose], [frequency of use], [how long you've used it]"





2. AI Avatar/Clone Experience

a) Have you created AI avatars or AI clones for video content? If yes, describe:

     What tools did you use?

     What was the process from start to finish?

     How did you train or set up the avatar/clone?

     What types of videos did you create with it?



b) What are the biggest challenges when creating AI avatar videos that look professional and natural?

c) If you haven't created AI clones before, describe any experience you have with AI video tools and your willingness to learn avatar creation.





3. Social Media Management Experience

     a) What social media accounts have you managed? List the platforms, account type (business/personal), and approximate 

          follower count.

     b) What was the highest posting volume you've managed? (posts per day/week)

     c) What scheduling tools have you used? List them and describe your experience level with each.





4. Working Style

     a) Describe your process for managing a high volume of content. How do you stay organized?

     b) How do you handle a situation where AI generates content that doesn't match brand guidelines?

     c) What hours are you available to work? What time zone are you in?





5. Quick Test

Here's a simple brand guideline: "Our brand uses navy blue (#142952) as the primary color, green (#39AC6B) for buttons, and gold (#F0B810) for accents. Our tone is professional and confident — never cheap or gimmicky."

Imagine an AI tool generated a social media post with a bright red background, Comic Sans font, and the caption "CRAZY DEALS!!! Act NOW before it's too late!!!"

     a) What's wrong with this output?

     b) How would you fix it or what would you prompt the AI to regenerate?





6. Availability & Rate

     a) When can you start?

     b) What is your hourly rate in USD?

     c) Are you available for 35-40 hours/week?



WHAT WE PROVIDE



Comprehensive brand guidelines (colors, fonts, voice, imagery rules)

Detailed content calendar and posting schedule

Access to AI tools (we'll provide subscriptions)

Training on our specific brand requirements

Clear communication and feedback

Long-term opportunity as we grow





COMPENSATION



Hourly rate: Competitive, based on experience

Payment: Weekly or bi-weekly via PayPal, Wise, or similar

Long-term: This is an ongoing role, not a one-time project





HOW TO APPLY



Send your application to 
] with subject line: "AI Social Media Manager — [Your Name]"

Include:



Answers to ALL application questions above

Your resume or portfolio link

Links to social media accounts you've managed (if public) or screenshots

Examples of AI-generated content you've created (if available)





Applications that don't answer the questions will be automatically rejected.





HIRING PROCESS



Application review (1-2 days)

Short video interview (15-20 min)

Paid test project (2-3 hours of work)

Final decision



We're looking to hire within 1-2 weeks.



RED FLAGS (What Will Disqualify You)



Listing AI tools you haven't actually used

Vague answers like "I'm familiar with many AI tools"

No specific examples of social media accounts managed

Poor English writing in your application

Not answering all the application questions





GREEN FLAGS (What We Love to See)



Specific examples with metrics

Screenshots or portfolio of work

Experience creating AI avatars/clones with examples

Honest about what you know vs. what you're learning

Clear, organized communication

Proactive problem-solving mindset





We're excited to find the right person to join our team. If you're comfortable with AI tools and thrive in fast-paced, high-volume environments, we'd love to hear from you.

title: Media Buyer (Google Ads)
description:
We're a growing agency looking for an experienced Google Ads PPC Specialist to manage and optimize paid search campaigns across a portfolio of clients. You'll take ownership of campaign strategy, execution, and performance, driving measurable results from day one.



Responsibilities:

- Plan, build, and manage Google Ads campaigns (Search, Display, Performance Max) across multiple client accounts

- Conduct keyword research, audience targeting, and competitive analysis

- Write compelling ad copy and collaborate on landing page recommendations

title: Sales Executive (Revenue Operations Consulting)
description:
Location: Remote

About Revenue Ops LLC:

Revenue Ops LLC is a specialized Salesforce and Revenue Operations consulting firm helping growth-focused companies align marketing, sales, customer success, and technology. We design and implement scalable systems across Salesforce, Marketing Cloud, Data Cloud, Agentforce, and related platforms to drive measurable revenue impact.



We are growing and looking for a high-performing Sales Executive to help expand our client base.



Role Overview:

We’re seeking an experienced, self-driven Sales Executive who understands complex B2B services sales—particularly in the Salesforce and RevOps ecosystem. This role is responsible for generating new business opportunities, managing the full sales cycle, and helping position Revenue Ops as a strategic partner.



This is a remote role, but the candidate must work Eastern Standard Time (EST) business hours to align with our team and client base.



Key Responsibilities:

-Manage the full sales cycle from discovery to close

-Maintain accurate forecasting and CRM hygiene

-Build long-term relationships with founders, RevOps leaders, marketing leaders, and Salesforce stakeholders and Salesforce sales reps

-Represent Revenue Ops professionally in sales calls and industry conversations



Ideal Candidate Profile:

-3–7+ years of B2B services sales experience

-Experience selling Salesforce, RevOps, or marketing technology services strongly preferred

-Comfortable selling consultative, solution-based engagements

-Strong discovery and communication skills

-Highly organized and self-motivated

-Experience using Salesforce (or similar CRM)

-Ability to work independently in a remote environment

What Success Looks Like:

-Strong close rates on qualified opportunities

-Clear, accurate forecasting

-Professional representation of the Revenue Ops brand

-Contribution to repeatable sales processes



Compensation:

-Competitive base salary + commission structure, open to negotiation for the right candidate.  Currently $2000 USD/mo. + 10% of first-year TCV for new business

-Performance-based upside

-Flexible fully remote environment

-Opportunity to grow with a fast-scaling consulting firm, and help to build out the sales practice



How to Apply:

Please submit your resume and a brief note outlining:

-Your experience selling consulting, SaaS, or Salesforce-related services

?

?

?

?

?

?

title: Microsoft 365 Security & Intune Engineer (Remote – Philippines)
description:

Mentor our team, review our current setup, and recommend practical improvements we can realistically maintain.

title: Virtual Front Desk & Insurance Verification Specialist (Camera-On Role)
description:
Job Overview



We are seeking a professional and reliable Virtual Front Desk & Insurance Verification Specialist to serve as the first point of contact for patients while supporting administrative and billing tasks. This is a camera-facing role, meaning you will interact with patients through video and represent the clinic in a professional and welcoming manner.



This position combines virtual front desk duties, insurance verification, and administrative support, including collections and patient account follow-ups.



Key Responsibilities



Front Desk (Primary Responsibility)

Answer incoming calls and respond to patient inquiries professionally



Schedule and confirm appointments



Assist patients with forms, check-in procedures, and general questions



Maintain a friendly and professional camera presence at all times



Insurance Verification



Verify patient insurance eligibility and benefits



Confirm coverage details including copays, deductibles, and authorizations



Communicate insurance information to patients and clinic staff



Document verification results accurately in the system



Administrative Support

Support administrative and billing-related tasks as needed



Maintain accurate patient records and documentation



Help ensure smooth daily clinic operations



Qualifications



Previous experience in medical front desk, insurance verification, or healthcare administration preferred



Strong English communication skills (spoken and written)



Comfortable working in a camera-on environment and interacting with patients professionally



Strong organizational and multitasking skills



Detail-oriented with good documentation habits



Experience with EMR/EHR systems is a plus



Reliable internet connection and quiet workspace required



Ideal Candidate



Friendly and confident on camera



Professional and patient-focused



Organized and dependable



Comfortable handling both patient interaction and administrative work



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys interacting with patients while also handling structured administrative and insurance-related tasks.

title: Account Manager
description:
Benefits:

Work From Home

Guaranteed $500 USD per week

Additional available if you perform well

Unlimited potential through residual because you earn as long as your customers say with Fleetsmarts





What we do as a company:

We give a fuel card away for free to truckers in the US that have discounts on diesel fuel. We have add-on products that make the sale more attractive to the customer. Customers can get weekly credit lines for their fuel card if they use our factoring service, which is akin to a pay-day loan service for businesses, but we provide this service for free. We also have a service to help reduce the down payment on their insurance. We market to new trucking companies that are just starting out and all our products are designed to help them get going faster than they would be able to on their own.





What you do:

You call warm appointments for truckers who have already expressed interest

You explain how we can help them

95% of people say yes

The key is following up until they actually start using our services





We set up 4 interviews per day in between the hours of 4:00 and 6:00pm

We will choose one new Cat 3 Re-Engager per week.

After one week, if they don’t hit 60% patch rate, they are out.

For 5 weeks, if they hit high patch rate, we rotate them between Hannah and Cat 1s

We promote one each week to Cat 3 leads and replace our worst AM.





Key Responsibilities:

Proactively follow up on abandoned or inactive leads assigned to account managers.

Present and promote fuel card programs, factoring services, and insurance solutions to potential clients.

Assist customers with the activation of fuel cards and ensure a preferred payment method is added.

Offer factoring services and guide customers through the contract signing process to ensure completion and compliance



Qualifications:

Proven experience in sales, customer retention, or outbound calling (required)

Strong communication and negotiation skills

Confident handling high-volume outbound calls

Goal-oriented, persistent, and able to work independently

Organized and comfortable using CRM tools and office software

Positive attitude and ability to build rapport quickly

title: -= Human Resource & Organizational Development Manager =-
description:
We are a growing U.S.-based IT Solutions company specializing in network infrastructure, field deployments, cable management, and client-facing technical services.



As we transition from startup phase into structured growth, we are building a formal leadership framework to support long-term scale.



We are seeking a reliable, strategic, and structured HR & Organizational Development Manager to lead recruitment rigor, performance systems, KPI tracking, leadership development, and organizational growth across our operations-driven IT environment.



This role plays a critical part in ensuring we hire the right people — particularly administrative staff and IT field technicians — while also building the internal systems that support measurable performance, leadership development, succession planning, and long-term retention.



This is a leadership-tier role with direct influence on company structure, performance and culture.



Core Responsibilities

Recruitment & Hiring (Remote Internal Staff | Field Technicians)

• Manage full-cycle recruitment for remote internal staff and technical field service roles.

• Develop clear, performance-based job descriptions aligned with operational realities.

• Source and screen candidates from hiring platforms.

• Conduct structured interviews and partner with department heads on final evaluations.

• Evaluate IT field technician candidates (network infrastructure, structured cabling, deployments, troubleshooting).

• Screen for hands-on technical competence and reliability.

• Validate real-world field experience beyond resume claims.

• Maintain an organized hiring tracker and candidate pipeline.

• Improve hiring quality and reduce costly mis-hires.

• Coordinate with Operations to align hiring with project pipeline demands.



Attendance Monitoring & Workforce Accountability

• Oversee structured attendance and punctuality systems across remote and field teams.

• Track time logs for administrative staff and field technicians.

• Ensure accurate and timely weekly timesheet submissions.

• Identify attendance concerns early and provide structured reporting to leadership.

• Maintain documentation for performance discussions when necessary.

• Reinforce accountability standards across all professional tiers.



KPI Tracking & Performance Monitoring

• Implement and maintain KPI dashboards across departments.

• Ensure measurable performance expectations are clearly defined and documented.

• Track productivity, responsiveness, task completion rates, and output quality.

• Support
day onboarding evaluations.

• Coordinate structured performance reviews with department heads.

• Provide data-driven recommendations, including performance improvement plans or termination when necessary.

• Identify leadership development and upskilling opportunities.



Organizational Development & Leadership Growth

• Develop structured onboarding programs for administrative and technical roles.

• Create role-specific training checklists and competency milestones.

• Design succession planning frameworks for key positions.

• Support leadership development initiatives across departments.

• Contribute to organizational design as the company expands.

• Strengthen long-term retention through career path clarity and performance alignment.



HR Documentation & Operational Support

• Maintain organized employee records and contracts.

• Document performance discussions and HR-related actions.

• Support payroll validation through accurate attendance and time-tracking review.

• Ensure documentation compliance across all roles.

• Build scalable HR processes that support future departmental expansion.



Tools & Platforms



Experience with:

• Indeed, LinkedIn, OnlineJobs.ph, and other remote hiring platforms

• Microsoft 365

• SOP documentation systems

• KPI tracking and reporting tools



Qualifications

• Minimum 5 years' experience in HR, People Operations, or Organizational Development

• Experience hiring within technical services or IT operations environments strongly preferred

• Demonstrated experience building systems (not only maintaining them)

• Strong understanding of KPI implementation and workforce metrics

• Experience advising leadership on performance-related decisions

• Comfortable making high-accountability recommendations when necessary

• English proficiency C1 or higher (required)

• Organized, structured, and strategically minded

• Comfortable working in a performance-driven, remote operations environment



Compensation

• $450–$500 per week based on experience and demonstrated capability

• Leadership-tier role with direct influence on company growth



How to Apply

Important: We receive a high volume of applications. Only candidates who follow the application instructions below will be considered.



Apply by sending us a message with the subject line:

“HR & Organizational Development Manager”



Start your message with:

“Blue Mockingbird”



Please include:

• Resume/CV

• WhatsApp contact number

• A short video introduction explaining why you are a strong fit for this role and describing systems you have built or improved in prior organizations

title: NetSuite Support Administrator/Consultant
description:
The Role

We're seeking an experienced NetSuite Administrator to join our team as a dedicated support specialist. You'll become an embedded part of our clients' teams, providing responsive daily support through Slack/Teams and helping them get the most out of their NetSuite systems.



What you'll be doing:

• Serving as the first point of contact for client NetSuite queries via Slack, Teams, and tickets.

• Managing and responding to support tickets promptly and professionally

• Acting as an extension of clients' teams - learning their business, processes, and terminology

• Troubleshooting NetSuite issues and providing clear, timely solutions

• Handling user administration, roles, permissions, and access management

• Creating and modifying saved searches, reports, and dashboards based on client requests

• Configuring workflows, custom fields, and forms to support evolving business needs

• Supporting month-end processes and period close activities

• Documenting solutions and building knowledge bases for clients

• Escalating complex issues to our UK directors when needed



What We're Looking For

Essential:

• Several years of hands-on NetSuite administration experience

• Strong customer service orientation with a "can-do" attitude

• Excellent responsiveness - you understand that timely support builds trust

• Outstanding written English communication skills (you'll be representing clients' teams)

• Experience using Slack and/or Microsoft Teams for professional communication

• Comfortable managing multiple support queues and prioritising requests

• Ability to explain technical concepts clearly to non-technical users

• Strong knowledge of NetSuite core modules (Finance, CRM, Inventory)

• Proven ability to work independently while being highly collaborative



Desirable:

• Experience in a support or helpdesk role within a consulting/MSP environment

• Knowledge of SuiteScript or other technical NetSuite capabilities

• Experience working with NetSuite accounts that are integrated with other systems (CRM, WMS, etc.).



What We Offer:

• Stable, long-term position with predictable retainer clients

• Opportunity to build genuine relationships with clients you'll support daily

• Direct collaboration with UK-based directors who value quality support

• Professional development in both NetSuite and client relationship management

• Supportive environment where your responsiveness and problem-solving are valued

• Remote working



Working Hours

You'll need availability during UK business hours (GMT/BST) or significant overlap to provide real-time support to our clients.



About Us

We're a UK-based NetSuite consulting practice working with growing businesses across various sectors. Our client-focused approach emphasises quality delivery, long-term partnerships, and becoming a trusted extension of our clients' teams. We're expanding our team to provide seamless, day-to-day support for our retainer clients.

title: Dental Case Intake Specialist (Licensed Dentist Required)
description:

Part-Time ? Full-Time Track

hundreds of clinics across the U.S. and Canada. We specialize in crowns, bridges, implants, 

nightguards, orthodontics, and more — with aggressive turnaround times and high production 

standards.

Position Structure

• Hourly compensation 



However: 

This position is designed to scale to full-time in the near future. 



You must be willing and able to transition to full-time (40+ hours/week) as volume increases. 

This is not a permanent part-time role. 



If you are only looking for side income or limited hours long-term, this is not the right fit. 



Core Responsibilities

Compensation

title: Draw Coordinator with mortgage lending experience needed full time for a national private lender
description:
Project Overview

Dominion Financial Services (DFS) is a fast-growing real estate lender specializing in Short-Term Bridge Loans and Long-Term Rental Loans for real estate investors across the country. We are looking for a highly detail-oriented Draw Coordinator to support our Loan Servicing team and ensure accurate, timely processing of construction draw requests. In this role, you will play a key part in coordinating inspections, reviewing borrower documentation, tracking balances, and supporting fund disbursements while maintaining compliance with loan terms and company processes.



If you have draw processing or mortgage servicing experience, strong Excel skills, and thrive in a structured, process-driven environment, we would love to hear from you. Please share your background in mortgage lending or draw coordination, relevant systems experience, and your earliest availability.



As a Draw Coordinator You Will:

Work closely with the Draw Administrator to manage the full draw lifecycle, from borrower requests through inspection coordination and fund disbursement. You will review draw requests from borrowers, contractors, and vendors for completeness and accuracy while collaborating with underwriting, servicing, and accounting teams to verify project progress and documentation. The role includes maintaining accurate records of draw activity, organizing project documents, tracking balances, ensuring compliance with loan terms, and communicating status updates to borrowers and stakeholders. You will also coordinate inspections with third-party vendors, review invoices for accuracy, identify discrepancies, and recommend process improvements to enhance efficiency and reduce risk across the draw workflow.



Required Skills & Qualifications:

Candidates should bring at least three years of experience in mortgage lending, loan documentation, draw processing, or a related financial services role. Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office, especially Excel and Word, is required along with excellent analytical, organizational, and problem-solving skills. The ideal candidate is highly detail-oriented, committed to data accuracy and compliance, and comfortable working with general ledger concepts and common banking transactions in a fast-paced lending environment.



Why You’ll Love Working With Us: 

• Long-term, steady work with a national lender. 

• 100% remote role—work productively from anywhere.

• Supportive, collaborative team culture that values accuracy, efficiency, and teamwork. 



Timeline:

• Full time, long-term position

• Schedule: 9AM to 5PM Eastern Standard Time

• Start date: ASAP

title: Part-Time SEO Specialist – Hospitality SaaS
description:
Part-Time SEO Specialist – Hospitality SaaS



WISK.ai is hiring a part-time SEO Specialist with 2–3 years of hands-on SaaS SEO experience to drive qualified organic traffic and increase demo bookings in the hospitality technology space.



We serve restaurant groups, bars, multi-location operators, and hotel F&B teams. This role requires someone who understands how to rank high-intent software pages and clearly communicate performance in a way leadership can act on.



We’re looking for someone who can connect SEO directly to pipeline and revenue impact.



---

## What You’ll Own



- Keyword research targeting high-intent hospitality SaaS terms (e.g., inventory software, food cost management system, bar management software, POS integrations)

- Optimization of product, feature, integration, and industry landing pages

- Schema implementation for SaaS (SoftwareApplication, Product, FAQ, Review, Organization)

- Technical SEO audits: crawlability, indexing, canonicalization, Core Web Vitals

    - Google Search Console

    - Ahrefs and/or SEMrush

    - Screaming Frog

    - Google Tag Manager (preferred)

    - Core Web Vitals / PageSpeed tools

- Ability to track the full funnel from traffic ? engagement ? demo bookings

- Experience collaborating with developers for implementation



---

## Reporting & Communication

- Ability to build clear SEO dashboards and monthly reports

- Present insights in a way leadership can understand

- Translate rankings and traffic into business impact

- Identify actionable next steps based on data



---

## Details

- Flexible hours with EST overlap required

- Remote

- Long-term opportunity

---

## To Apply



Send your resume to 
 including your application and portfolio.

Please answer the following questions in your
:
