title: SEO Admin / Junior WordPress Developer
description:
Remote | Full-Time | Virtual Assistant

About Us

We are a Canadian digital marketing agency looking for a reliable Virtual Assistant with excellent attention to detail and a solid working knowledge of WordPress and SEO fundamentals. The work involves making precise edits, implementing technical changes, and completing tasks accurately and efficiently. Where possible, we will provide instructions and SOPs - but this role requires someone who is genuinely tech-savvy, can learn independently, and is comfortable figuring things out when detailed guidance is not available.

Role Overview

This is a technical admin role focused on WordPress site maintenance, SEO implementation, and tracking/analytics setup. You will be responsible for making precise edits to existing websites, installing tracking codes, implementing SEO updates, and keeping our team informed of your progress. We provide instructions and SOPs wherever possible, but you should be comfortable using your own technical judgment and resourcefulness when detailed guidance is not provided.

Key Responsibilities

Update meta tags, title tags, H1-H3 headings, and tracking codes on WordPress sites.

Create and install GTM, GA4, CallRail, and Google Search Console codes on WordPress sites.

Make minor edits to existing WordPress pages, create new pages based on templates, and insert pre-approved copy from provided Google Docs.

Complete SEO optimizations including title updates, heading structure fixes, redirects, page deletions, NOINDEX settings, and page merges.

Follow task instructions provided in Google Sheets sitemaps and Google Docs copy documents.

Source contextually relevant stock images to support page content.

Update reports and dashboards when required.

Proactively communicate progress, flag roadblocks, and reach out to the team for support when needed - do not stop work and wait to be chased.

What We Expect

Proactive problem solving. If you hit a roadblock, reach out - do not sit and wait.

Strong attention to detail. You catch mistakes before we do.

Tech-savviness and a willingness to learn. SOPs and instructions will be provided where possible, but you need to be comfortable figuring things out independently when they are not.

Reliability. We want someone consistent looking for a long-term role.

Efficient execution. Quality and accuracy matter, and we expect tasks to be completed without unnecessary delays.

Qualifications

Hands-on experience with WordPress (editing pages, installing plugins, managing basic settings).

Familiarity with GTM, GA4, Google Search Console, and CallRail setup and installation.

Understanding of basic SEO principles (title tags, meta descriptions, heading hierarchy, redirects, NOINDEX).

Ability to follow written and video instructions precisely.

Strong English communication skills (written and spoken).

Organized and able to manage multiple tasks across client accounts accurately.

Stable internet connection and quiet work environment.

Minor Shopify experience is an asset but not required.

What We Offer

Stable, long-term remote position.

Competitive salary (paid in PHP).

Training and SOPs provided where available.

Supportive remote team environment.

How to Apply

Please send:

Your updated resume.

A short cover letter explaining your WordPress and SEO experience, and why attention to detail matters for this kind of work.

Include the phrase "Green Apple" at the top of your cover letter so we know you read this carefully.

- Chrome extensions and browser tools - productivity boosters for media buyers and affiliates



Must-Have Skills



- Expert-level proficiency with AI coding tools such as Claude (Artifacts and Projects), Cursor, Bolt.new, Lovable, Replit Agent, V0, or similar

- Strong fundamentals in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and/or Python. You don't need to be a 10-year senior dev, but you need to understand code well enough to debug, refine, and ship AI-generated output

- API integration experience. Comfortable connecting tools via REST APIs, webhooks, and third-party services (Stripe, OpenAI,
 API, tracking platforms, etc.)

- Frontend design sense. You can build tools that don't just work, they look professional and clean

- Self-starter mentality. You take a brief, figure out the best approach, and deliver without needing hand-holding

- Speed and output orientation. You ship fast, iterate quickly, and don't get stuck in analysis paralysis



Nice to Have (Not Required)



- Experience with affiliate marketing,
 Ads, or digital advertising

- Familiarity with tracking platforms (RedTrack, Voluum, Hyros, ClickMagick)

- Experience building Chrome extensions

- Knowledge of n8n, 
, or Zapier for workflow automation

- Experience with databases (Supabase, Firebase, Airtable, or similar)

- Video editing or creative design skills (CapCut, Canva API, FFmpeg)



Who You Are



You're the kind of person who sees a cool marketing tool and immediately thinks "I could build that." You're constantly experimenting with new AI tools. You probably have a folder full of side projects you've built just for fun. You don't wait to be told what to do. You figure it out, build it, and then ask for feedback.



You understand that in 2025/2026, the game has changed. AI has made it possible for one talented builder to do what used to take an entire dev team. You're riding that wave and getting better every single day.



What We Offer



- Competitive salary based on experience and output (we pay well for top talent)

- Performance bonuses. When you build tools that move the needle, you get rewarded

- Full-time, long-term position. This is not a one-off gig, we're building a team

- Work directly with the founder. No corporate red tape, no middle management layers

- Creative freedom. You'll have real input into what we build and how we build it

- Learn cutting-edge marketing. You'll be immersed in a 7-figure affiliate marketing operation and learn skills most developers never get exposed to

- Access to premium AI tools. We'll provide subscriptions to whatever you need to do your best work



Role Details



Type: Full-Time (40 hours/week)

Schedule: Flexible. We care about output, not clocking hours

Location: Remote (Philippines-based applicants only)

Start: ASAP

Timezone overlap: Some availability during UK business hours preferred but not required



How to Apply



Don't just send a generic resume. We want to see what you can DO. In your application, please include:



- A short intro about yourself - who you are, what drives you, and why this role excites you

- Your AI coding tool stack - which tools do you use daily? How do you use them?

- 2-3 examples of tools or apps you've built - links, screenshots, or demo videos. These don't need to be marketing tools specifically, we just want to see your building ability

- A quick Loom or screen recording (optional but HIGHLY encouraged) - walk us through something you've built. Show us your process. This will put you at the top of the pile



PRO TIP: If you want to really stand out, build a quick tool or prototype related to digital marketing or advertising and include it in your application. Nothing says "hire me" louder than actually showing us what you can do.



We review every application personally. If you're the right fit, you'll hear from us fast.



Let's build something incredible together.

title: IT Web Development / Automation Specialist
description:
Job Title: IT Web Development & Automation Specialist

Location: Remote 

Job Type: Full-Time



Introduction: 

Vet Claim Solutions, a leader in veteran claim services, seeks an experienced Marketing Operations Integrator to streamline and automate our marketing workflows, optimize SEO strategies, and manage Google Ads. This role is perfect for someone who loves automation, data-driven decision-making, and optimizing marketing funnels for maximum efficiency. 



Key Responsibilities: 

• Develop and customize website

• Optimize website structure, content, and technical SEO to improve rankings

• Automation & AI Integration

• Build and optimize workflows and dashboard using Zapier, Zoho, or similar tools

• Leverage ChatGPT and AI tools to enhance content creation, customer engagement, and automation

• Integrate and optimize chatbots (e.g., ManyChat, Chatfuel, Drift) to enhance customer support and engagement

• Implement and maintain API integrations between platforms

• SEO & Website Creation Optimization & Customization

• Conduct keyword research and implement on-page and off-page SEO strategies

• Monitor Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs, or similar tools for performance insights

• Optimize website structure, content, and technical SEO to improve rankings

• Paid Advertising & Performance 

• Manage and optimize Google Ads for better ROI

• Implement tracking pixels, UTM parameters, and conversion tracking

• Monitor KPIs, campaign performance, and customer journey analytics

• Identify trends and recommend data-driven optimizations

• Other tasks assigned



Qualifications:

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, IS, Technology Management or related field

• At least 2 year of experience in web development or a related role (REQUIRED)

• Hands-on experience with Zapier, Chatbots, Zoho, or similar automation tools (preferred)

• Experience with CRM and
 automation tools (Zoho, Mailchimp)

• Proficiency in Google Analytics, UTM tracking, and performance reporting 

• Strong proficiency in ChatGPT and AI-driven prompt engineering to enhance workflows

• Strong problem-solving skills and a data-driven mindset

• Experience in Meta Ads, Google Ads or paid acquisition strategies (preferred)

• Experience SEO best practices and tools like SEMrush, Ahrefs, and Google Search Console (preferred)

• Able to work on EST time zone





Preferred Attributes:

• A go-getter attitude with a commitment to helping the company grow.

• Quick learner with the ability to assess the company’s current brand and market position.

• Long-term vision: someone looking for a home where they can build their skills and grow with the company.



What We Offer:

• Competitive salary and benefits package.

• Opportunity to make a meaningful impact on the lives of veterans.

• A supportive and collaborative work environment.

• Professional development opportunities.



Compensation and Benefits

• Bonuses: Eligibility for monthly and quarterly bonuses based on personal and company performance.

• Salary Increase: Opportunity for a salary increase after a 6 months probation period for exceptional performance and goal achievement.

• 13 month bonus given

• Paid Time Off: 10 days of PTO plus an additional day off for each of the 11 US Federal Holidays.

• Professional Development: Possible opportunities for courses and training related to the role within the company.



How to Apply: Please reply here in Onlinejobs.ph and complete the questionnaires

(1) Exam1 

(2) Exam2 

(3) Pre Interview Questionaire 

Note: All 3 forms needs to be filled-up to proceed to next step.



Thank you.

title: Creative Strategist (Dropshipping E-Commerce)
description:
Rate: $6/hour

Schedule: Monday–Friday

Type: Long-term | Remote



About Us

We are a fast-scaling health & beauty e-commerce brand operating a high-volume dropshipping model and generating multiple 7 figures annually. Our focus is performance-driven, image-based creatives built to scale aggressively.

We are now building the next phase of our growth — and we’re looking for a Senior Creative Strategist who can take full ownership of our creative direction and lead our team to 8-figure scale.



This is not a junior role. This is for someone ready to step into leadership and long-term growth.



The Role

You will own and drive the creative strategy of the brand. Your responsibility goes beyond ideas — you will lead execution, manage a team, and ensure performance.



Core Responsibilities:

• Develop, test, and scale winning creative strategies and ad angles

• Create detailed, conversion-focused briefs for the editing team

• Lead, mentor, and manage a team of 7+ video/image editors

• Research competitors and proactively identify new creative opportunities

• Collaborate directly with the founder and media buying team

• Build systems to improve creative output and efficiency

• Take accountability for creative KPIs and overall performance



Who This Role Is For:

We are looking for someone ambitious, proactive, and performance-obsessed.



You should:

• Take initiative without waiting for instructions

• Apply feedback quickly and continuously improve

• Think both strategically and creatively

• Be deeply interested in performance marketing and paid social

• Treat the business like your own

• Want to grow into a high-level strategic leadership role



This role is not for passive executors.

We are building a high-performance team.



Preferred Experience (Not Required):

• DTC / B2C health & beauty e-commerce

• Creative strategy for Meta Ads

• Strong marketing copywriting

• Understanding of hooks, angles, positioning, and scaling creatives

• Portfolio of creative briefs, ads, or strategy work



We hire for drive and potential.

If you are highly motivated, learn fast, and want long-term growth — we will invest in you.



What We Offer:

• Full-time, long-term role

• Clear path to senior strategic leadership

• Direct mentorship from the founder

• Opportunity to lead and scale a creative department

• Performance-based bonuses

• Potential profit share for proven results



How to Apply (Follow Exactly):

Complete the mandatory application form:  

Submit your portfolio (ad concepts, briefs, creatives, or analyses)



Include:

• A short explanation of why you are the right candidate

• Your expected monthly salary

Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.

If you're ready to take ownership, lead a team, and build something significant — we’re ready to meet you.

title: Creative, enthusiastic VA
description:
I’m looking for an creative, enthusiastic VA who is seeking an opportunity to grow with me for a long term career. You must have good English skills, basic computer/internet skills, knowledge of Google Docs, pay attention to detail, eager to learn and outgoing personality. Knowledge of Canva with the ability to design decent social media posts, be personable and willing to take initiative. Attention to detail is a huge plus. I have multiple avenues in my business you will be helping me with. One is a woman's organization so you do need to be a woman as you will be interacting in the group. (Sorry, guys!)



My company is growing and your growth with it is only limited by your desire to learn and willingness to work. I’m looking for someone who will be dedicated and build a long term career with me. The more initiative you take, the more opportunity you will have. I want you to succeed in becoming an invaluable tea
mber and have no problem providing training and more so you can learn.



Tasks will include basic admin tasks, managing the general
 box, updating files, posting to social media, monitoring forums and helping with membership management. I need someone who isn’t afraid to communicate with people when needed and to think ahead to keep things moving. You must be very attentive to detail ,making sure you're being thorough with your work and checking it before you submit it. 



The position is for full time, with paid holidays, vacation and sick leave, as well as 13th month. As we grow, so will your responsibilities and salary. If you have another full time job, please do not apply. If you have a part time job, please include the hours you work in your response. The position will start as soon as possible.



Show me how detailed you are and how well you follow directions. Please respond with a cover letter telling me why you would like this position-don't be so formal, let me see your personality! Include your resume and some samples of social media designs you've created. Design samples are a MUST to be considered. Be sure to put “Attention to Detail" in the subject line. Applicants not including all of this will not be considered, as this shows me you don’t follow directions well.



Thanks for applying!

title: Freelance Pickleball Writer | The Dink
description:
The Dink is looking for a sharp, reliable freelance writer who can turn around quick-hit articles on pickleball news, trends, player stories, tournament updates, and cultural 
nts in the sport. 



The gig is simple: we send you a link or topic — an article, a social post, a press release, whatever — and you write a clean, engaging, publish-ready piece on a fast turnaround. 



We need someone who can nail tone (conversational but credible), nail facts (zero errors, every time), and nail deadlines (think minutes, not hours). You should have strong SEO chops — we're talking keyword optimization, smart headlines, meta descriptions, the works — and be able to bake that into your writing without sacrificing readability. 



Pickleball knowledge is a plus but not a must; what matters most is that you can quickly get up to speed on any topic and produce copy that's sharp, structured, and search-friendly. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.



To be considered, apply here and send an
 to 
 clearly stating your relevant experience.

title: English-Speaking Logistics Call & Operations Assistant (Mon–Fri, 9AM–3PM Europe Time, Up to $10/hr)
description:
We are looking for a reliable English-speaking assistant to handle business communication with logistics companies and partners.



This is NOT a sales position.



Working Schedule:

- Monday to Friday

- 9:00 AM – 3:00 PM (Europe time)

- Must be available and responsive during working hours

- Required response time: within 30 minutes

- No weekend work



Responsibilities:

- Make outgoing calls to logistics companies and partners

- Clarify shipment details and documentation

- Confirm timelines, terms, and operational specifications

- Resolve operational issues

- Handle more complex situations (e.g. delayed invoice payments, documentation delays, coordination problems)

- Follow up on ongoing cases

- Record call summaries in internal private company messaging system

- Call recording is required



Additional Information:

- Incoming calls are rare

- Secure telephony system is provided by the company



Requirements:

- Excellent spoken English (mandatory)

- Clear pronunciation and confident business communication

- Experience with international phone calls is preferred

- Ability to handle difficult or sensitive conversations professionally

- Stable high-speed internet connection

- Reliable and responsive during working hours



Experience in logistics is not required, but will be considered an advantage.



Compensation:

- $8–$10 per hour

- Paid in USDT

- Long-term cooperation

- Guaranteed paid availability hours



To apply, please include:

1. A 1–2 minute voice recording introducing yourself

2. Description of your experience with international calls

3. Your timezone

4. Your expected hourly rate

title: General VA – E-commerce & Business Operations (2.5.26)
description:
Are you an experienced VA who thrives in fast-paced e-commerce environments?



We’re looking for a proactive, detail-oriented, and resourceful VA to help us keep our Shopify stores running smoothly and efficiently. This role goes beyond basic admin tasks, you’ll be directly supporting operations, improving workflows, and contributing to the long-term growth of our business.



If you’re motivated, independent, and passionate about e-commerce, we’d love to hear from you.



-- Key Responsibilities



You’ll be working closely with our team to:



Support Shopify store management (updates, product listings, troubleshooting).



Oversee order processing and fulfillment coordination.



Assist with customer support communication (using Gorgias/Zendesk or similar).



Manage and update backend apps/integrations.



Create and maintain SOPs, reports, and task trackers.



Conduct research and administrative tasks to support business growth.



Help coordinate marketing activities 
s, promos, social content scheduling).



-- Required Skills & Qualifications



We’re looking for someone who is:



Experienced with Shopify (minimum 1 year of hands-on work).



Familiar with customer service tools (Gorgias/Zendesk or similar).



Skilled in organization, time management, and communication.



Proactive, problem-solving, and able to work with minimal supervision.



Comfortable with tools like Slack, Trello, Google Workspace.



Bonus: Experience with Klaviyo/email marketing or team coordination.



-- What We Offer



A long-term, stable role with growth opportunities.



The chance to work with a supportive, international team.



Career progression, potential to take on more responsibility in operations or management.



A role where your ideas and contributions are valued.



-- Who This Role is Perfect For



This is for you if:



You’ve worked as a VA, e-commerce assistant, or store manager and want to level up your career.

title: Virtual Permit & Paperwork Coordinator
description:
Primary Role Objective (Core Need):



This role exists to own and streamline the permitting and inspection process for residential AC changeouts and installations. The Virtual Permit & Paperwork Coordinator will be responsible for ensuring permits are submitted correctly, inspections are scheduled and tracked, and all documentation is complete — saving the owner and field team significant time as volume increases. This is a high-leverage role that directly supports operational scale.



Primary Responsibilities (Top Priority):



- Permitting & Inspection Coordination (Primary Focus)

* Submit online permits for residential AC installations and changeouts.

* Schedule and coordinate city/county inspections.

* Upload required photos and supporting documentation for inspections.

* Track inspection statuses, including:

1. Passed inspections

2. Failed inspections

3. Re-trips and re-inspections

* Follow up with municipalities to resolve permitting or inspection issues.

* Maintain an organized permit tracker (by job, address, status, inspector notes).

* Ensure all permits are closed out properly after final inspection.



This role becomes a huge time saver as the business completes more changeouts and installations.



Secondary Responsibilities (Supporting the Core Role)



- Administrative & Paperwork Support

* Maintain organized digital files for permits, inspections, and job documentation.

* Assist with general admin tasks related to jobs and projects.

* Update internal records, spreadsheets, or CRM systems as needed.

* Support internal coordination between office and field technicians.



Communication & Coordination:

1.City / county permitting offices

2. Inspectors

3. Internal tea
mbers

* Provide clear status updates on permits and inspections.

* Escalate issues proactively when delays or problems arise.

title: AR Specialist
description:
Omega Holdings is private equity-owned leading distributor of air conditioning and other high demand aftermarket components to a broad range of light-duty and heavy-duty vehicle end markets. Omega has created a unique, market leading platform in the automotive aftermarket with numerous opportunities to apply its repeatable playbook to grow both organically and through acquisition. With our product portfolio, dedication to quality, entrepreneurial setting, and competitive strength, we are a great place to build a lasting career.



Global Parts Distributors, LLC (gpd) began as a five-bay automotive A/C installation and repair shop in Macon, GA in 1974. By the early 2000s, gpd became a national distributor of aftermarket automotive A/C parts. Today gpd is a division of Omega Holdings and offers one of the most complete A/C lines in the automotive aftermarket and manages several warehouses across the US. Omega Holdings is looking for an AR Specialist to join our Accounting Team located in Irving, TX to support our gpd location.

Skilled and proficient at verifying financial or transactional data

Experience with Microsoft Business Central preferred

title: French Translator
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled French Translator to join our growing eLearning development team. This role is ideal for a detail-oriented linguist with a strong background in medical, healthcare, or compliance translation who can deliver accurate, culturally aligned content for French-speaking learners. If you are passionate about producing high-quality educational materials and enjoy working in a dynamic digital environment, we’d love to meet you.



Key Responsibilities

• Translate English eLearning course content into French with linguistic, technical, and cultural accuracy.

• Localize medical, dental, and regulatory terminology to ensure compliance with industry standards.

• Input, format, and organize translated text directly within Articulate Rise 360.

• Generate natural and accurate French audio narration using AI voice tools (e.g., ElevenLabs).

• Proofread, edit, and quality-check translated materials for clarity, consistency, and precision.

• Collaborate closely with the content development team to verify terminology and ensure alignment with compliance requirements.

• Maintain consistent glossaries, terminology databases, and style guides across all translated modules.

• Handle confidential and compliance-sensitive content with discretion and professionalism.

________________________________________



Qualifications

• Native or near-native proficiency in French, with excellent written and spoken communication skills.

• Strong fluency in English.

• Proven experience translating medical, healthcare, or regulatory/compliance-related content (required).

• Experience with eLearning tools especially Articulate Rise 360 is an advantage

• Familiarity with AI-based narration platforms (e.g., ElevenLabs) for generating French voiceovers.

• Exceptional attention to detail, accuracy, and linguistic consistency.

• Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

________________________________________



Other Details

• Schedule: 8 hours/day, Monday to Friday

• Days Off: Weekends

• Time Zone: Mountain Standard Time (MST)

• Employment Type: Full-time, Work From Home

• Start Date: ASAP

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer – Luxury eCommerce
description:

Location: Remote / Hybrid

Employment Type: Optional based on Candidate

This is not a maintenance role. This is a build-from-the-ground-up opportunity.

If you combine exceptional design sensitivity with strong frontend and backend engineering skills, this role is for you.



We are hiring a highly creative Full Stack Web Developer to help power the next generation of luxury eCommerce experiences for a hyper-scale global fashion brand.



This role sits at the intersection of premium digital experience, AI innovation, and intelligent automation. You’ll help craft seamless, high-performance online journeys that reflect the elegance of a luxury brand while leveraging advanced AI technologies from platforms such as OpenAI.

Scalable backend systems supporting global traffic

Ensure flawless responsiveness across mobile, tablet, and desktop

Design and develop secure, scalable backend services (Node.js, Python, or equivalent)

Build APIs to support product catalog, checkout, customer accounts, and integrations

Optimize performance for high global traffic volumes



What We’re Looking For



Core eCommerce Expertise

Exceptional Attention to Detail and Proven Design Skills

Experience building or scaling eCommerce platforms

Strong understanding of conversion optimization and UX for luxury consumers

Familiarity with headless commerce architecture

Payment gateway integrations and order management systems

React / Next.js / Vue (or similar)

Node.js, Python, or equivalent backend framework

REST or GraphQL APIs

SQL & NoSQL databases

Cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)

Experience integrating APIs from platforms like OpenAI

Curiosity about AI-driven personalization and smart commerce experiences



What Makes You Stand Out



Experience with luxury or premium retail brands

Knowledge of global eCommerce scaling challenges

Experience with AI-driven customer journey optimization

Strong product sense and attention to design detail

Ability to balance innovation with brand sophistication

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field — and/or equivalent industry experience.

Global Luxury Website Design in a Hyper Growth Phase

Local Hours and Fabulous Team Culture

Creative freedom to experiment with AI-driven innovation

Opportunity to shape the digital future of a high growth luxury brand

title: Direct Response Copywriter (Health & Wellness)
description:
We're a growing DTC supplement brand looking for a Direct Response Copywriter who doesn't just write copy, they study it. Someone who actively collects and analyzes winning ads as part of how they think. Someone who can look at a Meta Ad Library page and tell you exactly why the top-spending creative works.



This isn't a "write nice words" role. You'll be writing ads, VSLs, landing pages, and advertorials, all measured by real numbers. CTR, CPA, ROAS, AOV. Your words either move the needle or they don't.



You'll work closely with our marketing team, graphic designers, and video editors to produce high-volume, high-quality direct response assets for our brand. You'll research deeply, write fast, iterate based on data, and build a system for producing winners consistently.





What you'll actually do day-to-day:

* Write Meta ad scripts (short-form, long-form, UGC briefs, statics) at volume

* Write and optimize VSLs, landing pages, and advertorials

* Conduct deep avatar, competitor, and market research to fuel fresh angles

* Analyze ad performance data and use it to guide your next creative decisions

* Develop hooks, mechanisms, and positioning that differentiate — while staying compliant

* Use AI tools intelligently to speed up research and iteration — without losing the human edge



What we're looking for:

* 3+ years of direct response copywriting experience (DTC health, wellness, or supplements strongly preferred)

* A portfolio that shows real DR work — ads, VSLs, landing pages, not brand fluff

* You understand hooks, angles, and mechanisms and why they matter

* You've used performance data to iterate on your own copy

* You know your way around Meta Ads Manager metrics

* You can write fast, take feedback, and care more about results than ego



This role is full-time and requires full professional focus. No moonlighting, no freelance side gigs, no split attention. We invest in our people and expect the same commitment back.



Click here to apply : 
/jobs/
direct-response-copywriter-for-ecommerce-dtc-health-wellness

title: Accountant
description:
Next Wave Services LLC is seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Accountant to manage daily financial operations, maintain accurate books, and provide forward-looking cash flow visibility.



The ideal candidate is an Excel power user, experienced in QuickBooks, and comfortable producing weekly financial reporting and projections. This role requires strong financial discipline, proactive communication, and the ability to work independently.





Key Responsibilities



Financial Management



* Maintain accurate books in **QuickBooks**

* Record and reconcile all transactions (bank, credit card, loans)

* Manage accounts payable and receivable

* Prepare and send invoices

* Process payments and monitor collections

* Reconcile accounts monthly



Cash Flow & Forecasting



* Prepare and submit a **weekly cash flow projection**

* Monitor burn rate and working capital

* Provide rolling 4–8 week cash forecasts

* Identify potential cash shortages and recommend solutions



Reporting & Analysis



* Prepare monthly:



  * Profit & Loss Statement

  * Balance Sheet

  * Cash Flow Statement

* Track KPIs and financial metrics

* Support budgeting and financial planning



Meetings & Communication



* Attend **bi-weekly financial review meetings**

* Present cash position and financial summary

* Flag risks and financial concerns proactively

* Recommend operational improvements



Compliance & Controls



* Maintain financial documentation

* Ensure compliance with accounting best practices

* Assist with payroll coordination (if applicable)

* Maintain internal financial controls





Required Qualifications



* 2+ years accounting or bookkeeping experience

* Advanced proficiency in **Microsoft Excel**

  * Forecast modeling

  * Advanced formulas

  * Cash flow modeling

* Strong experience with **QuickBooks (Online preferred)**

* Strong understanding of:



  * Cash vs accrual accounting

  * Financial statement preparation

* High attention to detail

* Strong organizational skills

* Ability to meet deadlines consistently





Preferred Qualifications



* Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field

* Experience in small business or service-based companies

* Experience with financial forecasting

* Experience managing multi-entity books (if applicable)







 Performance Expectations



Within 60 days, this role should:



* Fully own bookkeeping

* Deliver consistent weekly cash flow projections

* Provide clean monthly financial statements

* Identify cost-saving or efficiency opportunities

title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO) – E-commerce Performance Company
description:
We are a fast-growing international e-commerce company operating multiple online brands across different markets. We are looking for a hands-on, analytical and strategic CFO who will take full ownership of our financial structure, profitability and cashflow optimization.



This is not a corporate reporting role. This is a performance-driven position where numbers directly impact daily decisions.



Your Core Responsibilities



1. Profit & Reporting Management

- Maintain and optimize the company profit sheet

- Share a structured daily profit update with management

- Ensure all revenue, ad spend, COGS and operational costs are correctly allocated

- Reconcile profit sheet with actual bank inflows



2. Cashflow Control

- Monitor daily cashflow across all accounts

- Analyze real net bank receipts versus theoretical profit

- Identify liquidity risks before they happen

- Optimize payout cycles and capital allocation



3. Cost Optimization

- Identify areas where we can reduce costs without hurting growth

- Analyze operational inefficiencies

- Improve margins across products and markets

- Negotiate better payment terms and pricing with suppliers



4. Forecasting & Financial Planning

- Create accurate monthly profit forecasts

- Predict next month’s cash position

 - Model different growth and scaling scenarios

- Advise management on safe scaling levels



5. Strategic Financial Leadership

- Build financial dashboards and KPIs

- Improve financial processes and structure

- Support decision making with data

- Implement financial controls and risk management systems



Requirements

- Proven experience as CFO, Finance Director or Senior Financial Controller

- Strong background in e-commerce, performance marketing or high cashflow businesses

- Deep understanding of profit sheets, cashflow forecasting and margin analysis

- Experience working with international suppliers and negotiating pricing

- Strong analytical mindset and high attention to detail

- Proactive, independent and solution oriented



What We Offer

- High impact role within a fast-scaling company

- Direct involvement in strategic decisions

- Freedom to build and improve financial systems

- Performance based growth opportunities

- Competitive compensation based on experience

The ideal candidate is highly fluent in Google Ads and Meta 
 & Instagram) advertising, with a strong understanding of B2B funnels, attribution, and lifecycle marketing. TikTok experience is a plus. This role sits under the Marketing Department and works closely with Sales, Content, Creative, and CRO teams to ensure consistent, scalable growth.

title: Senior Developer
description:
We are looking for a Senior Developer who is a versatile, all-around technical expert capable of managing end-to-end development of systems, applications, and web platforms. The ideal candidate thrives in a remote, collaborative environment and is comfortable supporting cross-functional teams with both front-end and back-end solutions, system integrations, automation, and technical troubleshooting.



This role requires a highly organized, detail-oriented, and technology-focused professional who can communicate effectively across teams, manage complex workflows, and adapt quickly to new tools and processes.



Key Responsibilities:

- Data Analysis & Reporting: Analyze data, create dashboards and visualizations, and use reporting tools to support decision-making while ensuring system security and compliance.

- Collaboration & Team Support: Work closely with marketing, operations, and leadership teams; communicate technical solutions clearly; provide guidance, mentorship, and contribute to process improvements.

mbers, document workflows and technical tools, and support ad-hoc tasks to improve team efficiency and continuity.



Qualifications:

- Strong understanding of IT procedures, system architecture, and security practices.

- Proficiency with Microsoft Office, Google Workspace, Excel, and data visualization tools.

- Excellent analytical, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills.

- Strong attention to detail, organization, and ability to prioritize tasks.

- Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.

Nice to have:

, Asana, Slack, and Time Doctor.

title: Full-Stack Developer – E-Commerce Platform
description:
ABOUT US



We are a US-based commerce company, the American arm of an established European e-commerce and trading group operating across 29 countries with 650,000+ products across multiple brands in construction, home improvement, sustainability, and premium bath & kitchen.



We are building a modular, AI-powered e-commerce platform and we need a developer who can build it with us.

Our motto: "Do it with Passion or don't do it at all."



THIS IS NOT A TYPICAL DEV ROLE

We don't need someone who waits for tickets. We need a builder who reads a spec and ships a prototype. You work directly with the CEO and his Operations Manager – a tight three-person core team. Fast decisions, no bureaucracy.

WHAT YOU'LL WORK ON



Data Connectors

Product Information Management (PIM)

Pricing Engine

Multi-Channel Feed Management

EDI Middleware (EDIFACT D96A – ORDERS, ORDRSP, DESADV, INVOIC)

Controlling & Finance Dashboards

Workflow Automation & Internal Tooling



TECH STACK



React, TypeScript, Python

Supabase (PostgreSQL)

n8n, Docker, Kong

Ollama, Claude API

Hetzner, GitHub Actions



MUST HAVE



3+ years full-stack (React + Python or TypeScript)

Strong PostgreSQL

REST API design and integration

Docker + Linux server admin

Can set up a full environment from scratch

Excellent English (daily standups with CEO and Ops Manager)



NICE TO HAVE



Supabase, n8n, Polars

E-commerce / marketplace experience

AI/ML integration



YOUR GROWTH PATH

Month 1–3: Infrastructure, first modules live.

Month 3–6: Core platform operational.

Month 6–12: Platform expands. You build your team.

Year 2+: CTO conversation. You built it, you lead it.

WHAT WE OFFER



Competitive salary (full-time, permanent)

Performance bonus

3-person core team – CEO, Ops Manager, and you

No legacy code – build from scratch

Flexible hours (4h CET overlap)

Modern stack, no bloat

Path: Developer #1 ? CTO

Hardware budget



NON-NEGOTIABLE



Excellent English (C1/C2)

3+ years full-stack experience

4+ hours daily CET overlap

Reliable internet, professional home office

Based in Philippines or Vietnam



HOW TO APPLY



CV (PDF)

Short intro: Why this role? What have you built? (3–5 sentences)

GitHub or portfolio links

Salary expectation (monthly, USD)

Earliest start date



BONUS CHALLENGE (Optional)

Parse this EDIFACT message into JSON and include it with your application:

UNH+1+ORDERS:D:96A:UN:EAN008'BGM+220+PO
+9'LIN+1+
:SRV'QTY+21:50'PRI+AAA:12.50'

title: Creative Project Manager, Motion Graphics & Video Content for SaaS and B2B
description:
Location: Remote, Philippines

Status: Full-time

Hourly Rate: $1,800 -$2,200 USD/Month

Shift: 6pm - 2 am (Manila time)



ABOUT SPARKPORTAL

At SparkPortal, we provide video content strategy and production specifically for SaaS and B2B companies. Our differentiator from other video agencies is that our business model is Video-as-a-Service. Unlike other video agencies, we work closer to the customer as their internal video team. Our clients trust our advice and follow our instructions instead of just submitting order requests. 60% of the videos we make for our clients are animation and motion graphics projects (Explainers, Promos, and Sizzles). In comparison, 40% of the videos are video editing projects (Riverside Interviews & Testimonials, Podcasts, & Webinar repurposing.)



ABOUT THE ROLE

This role will own the project management of all video projects by ensuring the creative team is providing high-quality video content for the clients. You will also be in charge of quality control, assigning tasks and moving projects along in Clickup. This role is an internal role but you will be required to meet with clients from time to time, so English communication and attention to detail are a must.



RESPONSABILITIES

Project Planning & Scoping

- Onboard new project requests from clients

- Translate video creative briefs into clear project requirements

- Develop video project plans and timelines

- Estimate resources and schedules (Designers and Animators)



Team & Resource Management

- Manage workload, capacity, and allocation across multiple projects



Communication

- Provide regular updates, gather feedback, and manage approvals.

- Collaborate with Associate Creative Director and Creative Director

- Manage expectations and resolve conflicts.

- Facilitate smooth collaboration within the team



Risk & Issue Management

- Anticipate challenges and develop mitigation strategies. (tight deadlines, resource gaps, scope creep)

- Monitor issues and escalate when necessary.

- Adjust plans proactively when challenges arise



Project Monitoring & Delivery

- Oversee daily project activities to ensure tasks stay on track.

- Track progress and ensure deadlines are met.

- Adjust schedules as needed while keeping deadlines realistic.

- Ordering VO for projects

- Review deliverables and ensure quality standards and requirements are met



Workflow and Process Optimization

- Maintain ClickUp processes and find ways to increase efficiency 



Project Documentation

- Maintain up-to-date lists like project history, approved projects, and pod scorecard.



Project Wrap-Up

- Deliver final outputs to creative director

- Close out and archive projects in ClickUp and Dropbox



JOB REQUIREMENTS

- 5+ years of experience as a project Manager or similar role

- 5+ years of agency experience

- Proven art direction or project management experience in managing multiple clients simultaneously

- Understanding of creative craft with a solid ability to scope, budget, and manage strict timelines and milestones

- High-level understanding of Digital advertising and social media platforms or Branding and communications

- Familiarity with the Adobe Suite (Ps, Ai, Ae, Id) and Figma

- Interest in AI and some knowledge of the leading creative AI tools (especially Midjourney and ChatGPT)

- An organized, customer-centric, and detail-oriented approach with an account management mindset

- Excellent verbal and written English skills with the ability to present ideas and coordinate work in large international groups

- Autonomy, decisiveness, and accountability



MORE ABOUT SPARKPORTAL

SparkPortal is an innovative video content agency with a twist! We help SaaS and B2B companies develop video content for their marketing strategies. The twist? We don’t do one-off projects. We offer Video as a Service (VaaS). Our customers “subscribe” to our video development solution. We work closely with them in partnership to continually deliver world-class video content based on their need for consecutive months or years. We are a small, agile organization providing tailored, personalized experiences that delight and drive ROMI. Our customers love us, and we love them!

mber

Compensation

Performance based bonuses



To Apply

Send us a DM

title: Video Editor for Cinematic Product Videos in a German Agency
description:
About Us:



We are a rapidly growing marketing agency from Germany, recognized as a market leader in our field. Our team is young, motivated, and passionate about producing outstanding content. We specialize in creating high-quality product videos for online shops and Amazon product pages. As we continue to expand, we're looking for Remote Video Editors to join our team for a long-term commitment.





Job Description:



We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to cut product videos. You will be provided with all the raw material and a detailed video script for each project. The role is entirely remote, requiring a high-speed internet connection due to the large size of the projects (avg. 100GB) for efficient uploads and downloads.





Training:



To ensure you're set up for success, we provide an extensive course on editing product videos, created by our team. Watching and learning from this course marks the beginning of our collaboration.





Trial Period:



The first week is a paid trial phase, where you'll go through our course and complete a test project. If the quality meets our standards, we will proceed with a permanent employment offer.





Requirements:



Experience in video editing

• Very good in Premiere Pro

• Good in After Effects and Photoshop

• Strong aesthetic sense and design skills

• Good English skills

• Interested in a full-time role (40 hours/week) and looking for long-term employment (years)





How to Apply:



Please submit your application with the subject "Gold-Video-Candidate" and include videos of your previous work.





Traits We Value:



• Ability to follow clear instructions and processes

• Discipline and determination

•. Eagerness to create amazing videos and push the limits





Benefits:



• Paid time off and paid holidays

• 13th-month pay

• Annual performance-based salary bonus/increases

• Internal training with exclusive knowledge





Join Us:



If you're passionate about making a significant impact with your video editing skills and are looking for a long-term, fulfilling career, we'd love to hear from you. Apply today to become a part of our success story!

title: Luxury Fashion Content Creator – Reels & Drop Marketing (Online Boutique)
description:
Styled by Nikki is a curated online fashion closet featuring rare, one-of-a-kind pieces — vintage high-end finds, designer resale, custom handmade garments, and exclusive statement pieces.



This is a founder-led brand built on instinct, presence, and curated authority. Pieces are released through structured weekly drops.



We are seeking a highly skilled Content Creator who understands luxury fashion aesthetics and can transform raw footage into elevated, high-converting short-form content.



?



Role Overview



This role is responsible for editing, structuring, and packaging short-form video content that builds anticipation and drives engagement for weekly curated drops.



This is not basic social media scheduling.

This is content strategy and execution aligned with product launches.



You will be working directly with the founder’s footage.



?



Core Responsibilities



Short-Form Video Editing

 • Edit 4–6 Instagram Reels per week from raw footage

 • Create strong hooks within the first 3 seconds

 • Add clean, minimal text overlays

 • Maintain polished pacing and retention

 • Repurpose content for TikTok and Pinterest



?



Weekly Drop Marketing Support

 • Plan and structure content around weekly product drops

 • Create anticipation posts and countdown sequences

 • Align content calendar with product release timing

 • Support conversion-focused messaging



?



Brand Voice & Caption Writing

 • Write confident, elevated captions aligned with brand tone

 • Avoid overly trendy or slang-heavy language

 • Maintain refined, feminine, controlled energy

 • Support call-to-action messaging for drops



?



Required Skills

 • Advanced short-form video editing (CapCut required)

 • Strong understanding of hooks and viewer retention

 • Experience working with fashion, boutique, or luxury brands

 • Strong written English skills

 • Ability to maintain a minimal, elevated aesthetic



?



Preferred Experience

title: Finance Manager E-Commerce Brand
description:
We are a fast-growing, performance-driven e-commerce brand looking for an experienced Finance Manager who understands the dynamics of high-volume online businesses.



This is not a theoretical role. We are looking for someone hands-on, analytical, and process-oriented who can build financial clarity and structure at scale.



Key Responsibilities

1. Supplier & Invoice Control



Review and verify all supplier invoices (COGS, shipping, surcharges, custom fees)



Ensure pricing agreements are correctly applied



Identify discrepancies and proactively resolve issues



Maintain structured invoice tracking and approval systems



2. Returns & Exchange Loss Analysis



Create a monthly overview of financial losses from:



Returns



Exchanges



Refunds



Payment processing fees



Identify patterns and financial leakage



Provide actionable recommendations to reduce loss rates



3. Daily Profit & Loss Reporting



Build and maintain daily P&L sheets



Track:



Revenue by payment provider



Ad spend



COGS



Refunds



Payment fees



Gross & net profit



Ensure full transparency of daily cash flow and margins



4. Process Optimization



Set up and improve financial workflows



Build structured reporting systems



Implement controls to prevent financial errors



Work closely with operations, customer support, and marketing



Requirements



Proven experience in e-commerce finance (mandatory)



Strong understanding of:



COGS structures



Payment providers (PayPal, Klarna, Airwallex, etc.)



Refund and dispute impact on margins



Performance marketing cost structures



Advanced Excel / Google Sheets skills



Analytical mindset with strong attention to detail



Hands-on mentality – you don’t just report problems, you solve them



Ability to build and improve financial processes independently



What We’re Looking For



We need someone experienced, structured, and proactive.

Mistakes cost money in our business — precision and ownership are essential.



You should be comfortable operating in a fast-moving, high-revenue environment and be able to create clarity in complex financial flows.



If you are detail-oriented, experienced in e-commerce finance, and ready to take ownership of financial transparency and process optimization, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Senior Dispute Manager
description:

Proven ability to reduce financial losses and improve dispute win rates

High level of reliability, ownership, and accountability



Experience in fast-paced e-commerce environments

What We Expect



Expert-level precision — errors directly cost money



Proactive problem-solving



Fast, structured execution



Clear communication and transparency



Ability to handle sensitive financial data responsibly



Commitment to continuous improvement



What We Offer

Long-term collaboration



High responsibility and real impact



Fast-moving, supportive team environment



Clear processes and room for optimization

Availability

title: Sales Call Setter & Sales Management Career in 2026
description:
Who are we:



At Connex Partners, we’ve been redefining the intersection of advisory services and executive networks since 2006. As a concierge consultancy, we serve mid and large sized enterprise employers in the HR Space, and US healthcare providers, and the innovative solution partners that support them.



We are going to be rapidly expanding in 2026 - and we’re looking for several strategic, quick thinking consultative Sales Associates to join our remote team. Fully paid and ongoing sales and sales management training and development is provided. It's less important whether you have relevant sales experience or not, What we do look for is your character, the degree of career focus and motivation, how willing and able are you to be trained, can you quickly think and effectively act outside of the lines, and the fluency of your English in a B2B US setting.



What You’ll Do;



Conduct consultative outreach and sales calls to senior executives (B2B) from mid and larger sized US Businesses., initiating meaningful conversations that secure a sales appointment.

Listen to and Understand the clients and their specific pain points and position Connex's services as value-driven solutions.

Effectively and creatively use tools like Linked In for outreach

Collaborate with U.S.-based teams providing candid feedback to help refine your own sales messaging, improve the outreach processes and sales sequences to find new best sales and practices.

Continually learn, improve and grow and earn a lot more in 2026 than you did last year.



What We’re Looking For Individuals who have:



Fluent spoken and written English with a reasonably neutral accent

Ideally 1+ years of B2B selling experience in the US, Canada, UK ideally engaging C-level or VP-level stakeholders in larger business's

Strong critical and quick thinking ability. They can quickly read any situation and intuitively pivot to the smartest most optimal way of doing something.

Self confidence, grit, accountability, honesty , a positive disposition and humor.

A drive to have a career in sales or sales management and the ability to earn what they are really worth. They want to be promoted based solely on their skills, results and innate potential to be an excellent Manager or leader.

Enough self motivation that they excel with autonomy. They work incredibly hard not because they are being asked but because to seize this fantastic career opportunity they need to run their own race and not be slowed by others.



Compensation & Career Advancement :



$6-$10 USD/hour starting rate, with salary increases based on performance (3-12months)

Monthly Commissions & Bonuses + regular Performance Incentives

Full-time role with long-term growth potential

Rapid Managerial & leadership promotional opportunities (3-6 months)

Collaborative team culture where you still have real autonomy to totally manage your own time , earnings and career

Fully paid sales and sales management Training and Development

If you're energized by meaningful B2B conversations, you can think beyond scripts, and you want to be part of a company where you can truly control your own career and advancement destiny then - we immediately want to hear from you.



To Apply:



Please attach your Resume in a PDF link, plus include a Video OR Audio Link about yourself. Please
 to 
 use Reference SMGT

title: Graphic Designer (Meta Ads & Email) - D2C Supplement Brand
description:
About SKIP!

SKIP! Supplements is a fast growing DTC e commerce brand from the Netherlands. We combine festivals and health with one mission: help people enjoy the weekend without sacrificing the days after. We are a young, fast moving team that values clear processes, quick communication, and high quality work.



Role overview

We are looking for a part time Graphic Designer focused on Meta Ads and
 campaigns. The founder currently designs everything, and we need an experienced designer to take over production so we can scale faster. Success after 90 days means you consistently deliver 10 static ad creatives per week and 1
 campaign design per week, on brand and ready to launch.



You will receive clear briefings and copy. You do not need to write copy, but you must understand English at B2 level so you can follow briefings and feedback.



Responsibilities

Weekly

Design 10 static Meta ad creatives based on our briefs and templates

Design 1
 campaign layout based on our brief and provided copy

Prepare export files in the correct sizes and formats for Meta and

Keep designs consistent with our brand guidelines and improve them over time



Monthly

Help us build and improve a simple design system, templates, and reusable components



Requirements

Strong portfolio with DTC performance creatives, preferably Meta ads

Experience designing static ad creatives that are clear, punchy, and conversion focused

Experience designing
 campaign layouts for ecommerce

Ability to work fast without losing quality, consistent weekly delivery matters

B2 level English to understand briefings and feedback

Good file organization, naming, and version control

Proactive communication, you ask questions early instead of guessing

Reliable internet and ability to work independently



Nice to have

Experience with supplement, health, beauty, or lifestyle brands

Basic understanding of direct response design principles, hooks, hierarchy, contrast

Experience with Klaviyo
 design constraints



Tools you will use

Figma or Adobe XD for design

Notion for briefs, planning, and asset delivery

Slack, WhatsApp, or
 for communication

Google Drive for files, if needed



Working hours and communication

You can choose your own working hours. We work in Amsterdam time, but the role is fully async.



Pay and growth

This is a part time role. We expect the workload to be around 7 hours per week. The pay is $5 per hour. We are a fast growing brand, so if things go well, there is a strong chance we will increase your weekly hours quickly.



How to apply

Send your portfolio and a short message about your experience with Meta ads and ecommerce
 design.



Application questions

1. Share 3 portfolio examples of Meta static ads you designed that performed well. What was the goal and what made them work

2. Share 1 to 2 examples of ecommerce
 campaign designs you made. What platform was used

3. What design tools do you use most and why. Figma or Adobe XD preferred

4. What is your English level and how do you make sure you understand a briefing and feedback quickly

title: Acquisition Specialist – Cold Call Hunter & Lone Closer
description:
Acquisition Specialist – Cold Call Hunter & Lone Closer



(No Handholding | No Teamwork | No Excuses – Pure Producer Role)



Apply only if you are the person who delivers results when the entire outcome is on your shoulders.

If you have never managed both ends of the sales cycle—mass cold calls and solo deal closing—do not apply.



Role Mission



You are the engine.

You are tasked with finding, qualifying, and personally closing off-market property deals (distressed assets: tax liens, inherited property, title headaches, “problem” homes, etc.).

There is zero separation of labor here—if you don’t create the pipeline, it does not exist. If you don’t close the deal, nobody else will.



You are measured on three simple, public metrics:



Daily live sales conversations (minimum 100, logged and recorded)



Active, qualified pipeline volume



Closed, contracted deals



Miss the numbers? No debate. You’re out.



Key Responsibilities



High-Volume Live Prospecting: Minimum 100 real conversations (not dials) daily. Tracked, recorded, and verified.



Instant Qualification or Ejection: Follow the binary criteria set—no slow plays, no endless nurturing. Every call is a decision.



Own the Entire Cycle: You negotiate, close, and contract. No help, no split roles, no account handoffs.



Obsessive CRM Discipline: Every action, conversation, and deal status logged—live and complete.



Process Loyalty: You operate under strict audit—every day, every deal. One miss is all it takes to lose the seat.



You Are:



A documented high-volume cold caller and solo closer (real estate or related asset class)



Able to instantly produce hard metrics (highest daily calls, annual closed deals, etc.)



Unapologetically obsessed with precision: pipeline data, notes, and accountability



Immune to direct criticism and hard pivots—you want output-driven, blunt leadership, not support



Someone who refuses to live off a base salary—hungry for unlimited, performance-only pay



Disqualifiers (Don’t Bother Applying If…):



You lack measurable outbound + closing numbers on your resume



You skip the voice memo or fail to follow the steps below



You come from team selling, split cycles, or shy away from 100% personal accountability



You have a history of missing quotas, hiding data, or resisting hard feedback



Application Process – Mandatory Steps



Resume: Must detail outbound and closing experience with specific numbers (highest daily calls, annual closed deals).



Voice Memo (2–3 min, unedited):



State your name, country, and your personal best for daily cold calls



Tell a short story of a complex deal you closed—your actions, your outcome



Explain your tracking and pipeline system—how do you keep score?



Share the bluntest feedback you’ve received and how you reacted



Say why this “solo, output-only” seat is the one you want



Miss any instruction = automatic rejection.



Do Not Apply If:



You can’t back up your experience with metrics and references



You need culture, encouragement, or constant training



You’re allergic to daily process, scorecards, or data review



You want a team, not a scoreboard

title: Mobile QA Tester — React Native App (iOS & Android)
description:
About the App:

We have built a family-focused mobile app that helps parents manage their children's screen time through tasks, rewards, and positive reinforcement. Kids earn points by completing tasks and can redeem them for rewards set by their parents. Think of it as a chore/reward system that motivates kids to stay productive.



What You'll Do:

Manually test the app on real devices (Android required, iOS strongly preferred).

Test both parent and child user flows — account creation, task management, rewards, notifications, settings.

Report bugs clearly with steps to reproduce, screenshots, and device info.

Regression test after new builds are deployed.

Verify fixes and flag any UI/UX inconsistencies across platforms.

Test edge cases — poor connectivity, different screen sizes, OS versions.



Requirements:

Own an Android phone (must have)

Own an iPhone (big plus — cross-platform testing is a priority)

Experience testing mobile apps (React Native experience is a bonus, not required)

Comfortable installing dev/test builds (Expo, TestFlight, APK sideloading)

Clear written English for bug reports

Detail-oriented — you notice when a button is 2px off or a loading state is missing

Available 10-20 hours/week (flexible schedule)



Nice to Have:

Experience with bug tracking tools (GitHub Issues)

Familiarity with Maestro or other mobile test frameworks

Multiple devices or different OS versions for broader coverage



Budget: $
/mo depending on experience (part-time, ~10-20 hrs/week)



This is a remote, ongoing role — not a one-time gig. We ship frequently and need consistent testing coverage.

To apply, tell us: what devices you have, your testing experience, and one example of a tricky bug you've caught in a mobile app before.

description:
We are a leading U.S.-based lifestyle and shopping platform serving a large Asian-American audience. Our company is rapidly expanding, and we are building a top-tier team of E-Commerce Deal Researchers who will help millions of shoppers discover the best deals every day.



We are looking for smart, detail-oriented people who love online shopping, researching products, and finding great prices. If you’ve worked with Amazon sellers, online arbitrage, product sourcing, or e-commerce research, this role will feel natural to you.



This is a long-term, stable role with growth, bonuses, and an amazing team culture.





What You Will Do

• Search major online retailers (Amazon, Walmart, Target, Best Buy, Costco, etc.)

• Identify the best deals, trending items, and lowest-priced products

• Compare prices using simple tools (Keepa, Amazon price history, etc. — training provided)

• Upload deals into our custom CMS (simple workflow, not WordPress)

• Write short, clear English descriptions for each deal

• Track fast-moving deals and limited-time offers

• Follow daily content schedules and coordinate with our editorial team

• Help our audience save money by selecting only high-value deals





Ideal Candidate

• Experience with Amazon product research, online arbitrage, VA product sourcing, or e-commerce research

• Fast and accurate researcher

• Excellent English reading and writing skills

• Can spot good prices, high-demand items, and “hidden gem” deals

• Strong attention to detail

• Reliable, disciplined, and able to follow SOPs

• Stable internet and working computer

• Comfortable working at a fast pace during sales seasons (Prime Day, Black Friday)





Hours, Pay & Benefits

• Full-time — 40 hours/week, Monday–Friday

• Must be available during US Eastern Standard Time (EST)

• Competitive monthly salary (based on experience)

• 13th month pay

• Paid vacation days

• Performance bonuses

• Long-term, stable employment with opportunities to advance

• Supportive, positive, fast-growing team





How to Apply



 your application to: 
 : Subject line: “[Your Full Name] – E-Commerce Deal Researcher Applicant”

• Your resume

 1. Do you have experience in Amazon product research, online arbitrage, or deal finding?

title: Content Strategy Manager
description:
We are a U.S.-based contractor education and consulting company focused on construction business owners building structured, profitable businesses.

Our brand is built on long-term authority, grounded in consistency, clarity, and disciplined positioning.

We do not chase trends or short-term attention.

We value:

? Consistency

? Credibility

? Clarity

? Structured systems

? Long-term positioning



About the Role

The Content Strategy Manager works directly with the video editor and reports to the Operations Manager.



This role sits between the Founder and the production team.



You are responsible for:

? What gets created

? When it gets created

? Why it matters

? How it is positioned

? How it is distributed



You are not just managing execution.

You are responsible for content strategy, structure, quality control, and brand alignment while ensuring workflows remain organized and scalable.



This role requires systems thinking, authority awareness, and comfort being the strategic filter behind all content decisions.



You must think in systems, not individual posts.



Platform Focus

Primary Platform: YouTube (Long-Form Authority Content)

Supporting Platforms:

?

? Instagram

? TikTok



Long-form builds authority.

Short-form supports positioning.

Every platform must reinforce the same strategic message.



Core Responsibilities

Content Strategy & Roadmap

? Build structured 30–90 day content plans

? Maintain strategic topic rotation

? Prevent audience fatigue

? Align content with workshops and educational offers

? Think 6–12 months ahead



Production Leadership (Video & Graphics)

You will manage and provide direction to:

? Video Editor

? Graphic Artists (thumbnails, visuals, promotional assets)



Responsibilities include:

? Giving clear direction before production begins

? Reviewing drafts with structured feedback

? Ensuring messaging and tone reflect authority

? Maintaining visual consistency

? Approving final content before publishing



Nothing is published without a strategic review.



Repurposing & Distribution Oversight

? Oversee YouTube ? Shorts ? multi-platform adaptation

? Maintain consistent messaging across all platforms

? Ensure branding and landing page alignment



Brand Protection & Positioning

? Protect authority positioning

? Prevent messaging dilution

? Ensure content attracts serious contractors

? Be comfortable saying “no” to misaligned ideas

? Protect the Founder’s time by avoiding reactive content



Systems & Governance

? Maintain master content inventory

? Track posted vs. unposted content

? Keep workflow structured in Asana

? Monitor analytics strategically



What We Value

? Authority over virality

? Systems over improvisation

? Long-term positioning over short-term spikes

? Audience quality over audience size

? Clarity over noise



Qualifications

You must:

? Have experience managing long-form YouTube content

? Understand how authority is built through consistency

? Think in systems, not posts

? Have experience directing both video editors and graphic artists

? Be comfortable giving structured, clear feedback

? Understand how organic content supports workshops and paid programs

? Communicate clearly and confidently in English

? Be organized, decisive, and proactive



We are building a serious education and consulting brand.

If you are looking for a trend-based social media role, this is not the right fit.

If you understand authority building, systems thinking, and brand protection, we would like to hear from you



If you are interested in applying for this position please provide the following:

1. Resume

2. Introduction Video

3. Please answer the following questions :

A. Share one YouTube channel you respect for authority, not just growth. Why?

B. An editor delivers a technically clean video that feels off. What do you do?

C. How do you maintain consistency across video and graphic teams?



Must be able to work form 8:30 am  to 5:30pm  Eastern Time

title: Real estate aquisitions
description:
We are a U.S.-based real estate investment company purchasing off-market residential and land properties directly from homeowners.



We are growing and looking for a confident, analytical, English-fluent Virtual Assistant to handle:

 • Warm & hot seller leads

 • Follow-ups

 • Light cold calling

 • Offer support



This is not just a cold-calling role. This is an acquisitions  position with growth potential.



?



???? Responsibilities



???? Warm & Hot Leads (Primary Focus)

 • Call inbound and pre-qualified seller leads

 • Build rapport and uncover motivation

 • Ask detailed condition questions

 • Gather pricing expectations

 • Enter detailed notes into CRM

 • Schedule follow-ups or live transfers

 • Present offers after approval (training provided)



???? Light Cold Calling (Secondary)

?



???? Requirements

 • Reliable internet connection



Base pay with bonuses will be discussed

title: Night-Shift Operations Support (11:30 PM – 9:30 AM, Long-Term Only)
description:
Night-Shift Customer Support Specialist (Full-Time, Remote)

Shift: 11:30 PM – 9:30 AM (Asia Timezone)



Salary & Benefits



$450–$500/month (Fixed)



6-Month Performance Review (Salary increase based on reliability & accuracy)



13th Month Pay after 12 months (PH standard)



Long-term stable position



About Us



We are a global payment service provider (PAYJN) operating in India, Indonesia, LATAM, and Southeast Asia.



We provide payment infrastructure services to online merchants.



This is NOT a call center job.

This is a structured, SOP-based operational support role.



 Work Schedule



Night Shift (Asia Timezone)

11:30 PM – 9:30 AM

10 hours per shift

6 days per week



Low workload overall, but must stay online and responsive during the entire shift.



Long idle periods are normal — but availability is mandatory.



Responsibilities



Reply to merchants through



Use internal BOT tools to check payment status



Follow internal SOP strictly (no improvisation allowed)



Provide clear and accurate English communication



Escalate technical issues properly



Maintain TimeDoctor active during entire shift



?? Important: Please Read Carefully



This role requires:



• Strict discipline

• Full shift availability

• No disappearing during duty

• No multitasking other jobs during shift

• No mobile-only work (must use computer)



Even during idle hours, you must remain alert and responsive.



If you are looking for flexible hours, part-time work, or side-income only — this role is NOT suitable.



We are looking for someone who wants long-term stability and respects responsibility.



? Requirements



Excellent English comprehension



Fast typing & quick response



Able to follow instructions 100%



Stable internet (minimum 50 Mbps recommended)



Own computer (not phone)



Quiet working environment



Comfortable with long-term night shift



Preferably 25 years old and above



Long-term commitment (1 year+) required



 Training Process



We provide structured SOP training.



Training period: 5–7 days



Training includes:

• BOT command usage

• Payment checking procedure

• Escalation process

• Communication style standardization



After training, probation period = 3 months.



Performance is evaluated based on:

• Response speed

• Accuracy

• Shift discipline

• Attendance



How to Apply



Please send:



Short introduction (include age & current living situation)



Confirmation you accept 11:30 PM – 9:30 AM shift



Internet speed test screenshot



Previous customer support experience



Why you want a long-term night-shift position



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
