title: Job Opening: Hybrid (Static Flo + AI Powered) Lead Generation Chatbot Developer For UK Dental Industry
description:
Company: Dental Chatbot

Website: 

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Type: Full-Time or Project-Based (to be discussed)



About Us



We’re Dental Chatbot, a UK-based company on a mission to revolutionise lead generation for dental practices. Our chatbots help dentists capture more enquiries and convert more website visitors into paying patients.



We already know that static flow-based chatbots work incredibly well in the dental space — but we’re ready to take things to the next level. That’s why we’re developing a single hybrid chatbot product:



- Static flow for high conversion rates (pre-set questions & answer buttons).

- AI-powered Q&A mode for free-text questions, using OpenAI integration with strict content boundaries.



This will be the first AI-powered chatbot in the UK dental industry — and you could be the one to help us make it happen.





The Project



We want to build a chatbot that has the conversion power of proven static chatbots (like this example: 
), but with the flexibility and wow-factor of AI.



Key points about the chatbot:



- Opens with 2-3 welcoming messages + clickable buttons for enquiry types.

- Static flow determines the conversation for most users (proven to convert well).

- AI mode triggers when the user clicks “Ask a question” — AI answers based on uploaded/reference files & prompts (no external data).

- The main objective is always to collect lead details (name, contact info, enquiry).

- Built as our own in-house solution (not using a subscription service like Quriobot).





What You’ll Do



- Design & develop our hybrid chatbot from the ground up.

- Build an intuitive, engaging static flow-based conversation system.

- Integrate AI functionality (OpenAI API) with strict boundary controls for data sources.

- Create a back-end system where we can easily manage chatbot flows, AI prompts, and reference files.

- Ensure chatbot can be embedded easily into any dental practice website.

- Work with our team to refine conversation logic for maximum lead conversion.





Skills & Experience We’re Looking For



? Proven experience building chatbots (please provide live examples).

? Familiarity with static flow conversation logic and AI integration.

? Strong knowledge of OpenAI API (including prompt engineering & fine-tuning).

? Proficiency in web technologies: JavaScript, HTML, CSS.

? Experience with backend frameworks (Node.js, Python, or similar).

? Knowledge of database management (MySQL, MongoDB, or similar).

? Understanding of data privacy & security best practices.

? UX/UI sensibility — you can make the chatbot look sleek and user-friendly.



Bonus Skills (Nice to Have):



- Experience in SaaS product development.

- Experience embedding chat widgets across different CMS platforms (WordPress, Wix, etc.).

- Knowledge of dental or healthcare industries.





What We Offer



- Competitive salary based on experience.

- Flexible working hours (we care about results, not clock-watching).

- Opportunity to lead development of a first-to-market product in the UK dental sector.

- Long-term work potential if the project goes well.





How to Apply



Please send:



1. A short intro about yourself and your relevant experience.

2. Links to chatbots you have built (with a short explanation of how each was created).

3. A proposed project plan & estimated timescale for building our hybrid chatbot.



Send applications via OnlineJobs.ph — we’re excited to see your skills in action.

title: Luxury Shopify Website Redesign & Custom Feature
description:
Luxury Shopify Website Redesign & Custom Features



I am the owner of Timeless Fits, a luxury fashion brand selling both new and second-hand clothing. We operate through an existing Shopify online store and a large physical boutique in the Netherlands, which customers can visit by appointment only.



This project is not a dropshipping store and not a basic template build. The website already performs well, but I am looking for a high-end redesign and functional expansion to elevate the brand, improve navigation, and strengthen the overall luxury experience.



Website:





?



Brand & Vision



Timeless Fits should feel like a premium fashion destination, comparable to platforms such as Farfetch.



Although we sell second-hand items, the overall experience must:

 • Feel luxurious, curated, and exclusive

 • Avoid any “thrift store” or marketplace appearance

 • Emphasize quality, styling, and presentation



The design should be clean, minimal, editorial, and fashion-forward, with strong typography, generous white space, and a heavy focus on professional photography.

All photography is already available and can be reused.



?



Scope of Work



1. Homepage Redesign (Main Focus)

 • Redesign the homepage for clearer structure and navigation

 • Guide visitors quickly and intuitively to what they are looking for

 • Create a strong first impression based on trust and luxury

 • Clearly highlight:

 • The online shop

 • The physical store (appointment-only)

 • The Sell2Us concept



2. Shopify Design & Development

 • Platform: Shopify

 • Scope: Design + Development

 • Reuse existing products, images, and copy

 • Fully responsive (mobile-first)

 • Performance-focused implementation



?



3. Sell2Us – Custom Resale Feature



A key part of this project is integrating a custom feature called Sell2Us, allowing customers to sell their own clothing to Timeless Fits.



Process:

 1. Customers upload photos of their item

 2. They receive an initial price estimate based on the photos

 3. The customer ships the item to us

 4. We inspect the item using predefined quality criteria

 5. If approved, the price is confirmed

 6. If the item condition does not match the submission, the item is returned and the customer pays shipping costs both ways



After approval, the customer can choose:

 • Direct payout, or

 • Store credit with an additional 5–10% bonus



Requirements:

 • Secure photo upload system

 • Clear terms & conditions with explicit user confirmation

 • Admin-side overview for reviewing submissions

 • Clear communication at every step

 • A robust workflow designed to minimize disputes



The developer may propose a custom Shopify solution or a stable external integration, with explanation.



?



4. Appointment Booking – Physical Store



Customers must be able to book an appointment through the website to visit the physical store.



The appointment flow should:

 • Allow users to request or book a time slot

 • Clearly communicate that visits are appointment-only

 • Require users to submit:

 • Full name

 •
 address

 • Phone number

 • Instagram handle



Submissions must be stored in the admin backend and/or sent via
, with a clear confirmation for the customer.



?



What I’m Looking For

 • Strong experience with Shopify

 • Proven work in fashion or luxury e-commerce

 • Ability to handle both design and custom development

 • Experience with custom forms and workflows

 • Clear, professional communication in English

 • Structured, detail-oriented approach



?



Timeline & Budget

 • Estimated timeline: 3–5 weeks

 • Budget: Flexible, depending on experience and approach



?



To Apply



Please include:

title: EXECUTIVE VIRTUAL ASSISTANTS
description:
We're not looking for someone who waits to be told what to do.

The Melody Manager Agency is hiring Executive Virtual Assistants, and we want to be upfront: this is not a typical VA role, and we are not a typical agency.



We work with purpose-driven American female entrepreneurs, women who are building businesses that matter and who need a real thinking partner in their corner. Not someone who completes tasks and logs out. Someone who actually gets it.



Who this is for

You have 5 or more years of professional experience. Maybe in BPO, corporate support, executive assistance, operations, customer success Management, or project coordination. The title matters less than what you actually did.



You understand American culture on a real level. You're comfortable with direct communication. You get the humor. You know that "this is fine" sometimes means it's not fine, and you know how to navigate that. You've worked with American clients or in American-facing roles, and you didn't just survive it, you thrived.



You are not a task-doer. You are a problem-solver. You anticipate what's coming before your client sees it. You follow up without being asked. You protect your client's time like it's your own. And when something isn't working, you say so, professionally and clearly, instead of just quietly struggling.



Who this is not for

If you're looking for a role where you wait for instructions and complete a checklist, this is not the right fit. Our clients are busy, sometimes intense, and need someone who can think independently. If excessive formality is your comfort zone, or if you've never really worked closely with Americans, this will be a difficult adjustment. We'd rather be honest about that now.



What you'll do

Manage calendars, inboxes, and communication for your client. Keep projects organized and moving. Anticipate needs before they're spoken. Protect your client's time and energy. Show up as a real partner, not just support staff. Handle direct feedback without shutting down. And bring enough steadiness that your client can finally focus on the work only she can do.



What we offer

Starting at $8 USD per hour, negotiated based on your experience, because we only hire people we're willing to compensate fairly. Health insurance. Quarterly performance bonuses. Earned PTO. Monthly training and real support from our team. And a "No Jerks Allowed" policy written into every client contract. You will never be disrespected in this role. We protect our people, and we mean that.

What we're looking for in your application



5+ years of professional experience in a role that required real judgment and independent thinking. Strong written and spoken English. Genuine familiarity with American business culture. And someone who is motivated by doing excellent work, not just by getting through the day.



If most of this sounds like you, don't talk yourself out of applying. The person I'm looking for probably won't feel 100% ready. Apply anyway.



Application form: 

CODE: HSVAMM1 



***Beacuse we get a lot of applications every day, only application that go through the link above are processed. Please make sure to course your application through that forma nd you'll be
ed by our team on next steps.

title: Sales & GHL Specialist

The qualified candidate will be responsible for outbound prospecting, nurturing leads, booking qualified appointments, and managing the entire sales funnel within GHL. This role focuses on generating and qualifying opportunities rather than closing deals, ensuring a consistent and optimized pipeline for the sales team.

.

Sales Funnel & CRM Management (GoHighLevel)

• Build, update, and optimize workflows, automations, and follow-up sequences.

Collaboration & Process Improvement



• Work closely with sales closers and leadership to improve lead quality.

• Provide insights on campaign performance and lead behavior.

• Recommend improvements to scripts, workflows, and automation strategies.

• Support launch of new campaigns inside GoHighLevel.



Requirements



• Minimum 2+ years of experience in high-volume sales, particularly cold calling and outbound prospecting.

• Proven experience booking appointments rather than closing full-cycle deals.

• Intermediate-level expertise in GoHighLevel (GHL)

• Strong understanding of sales funnels and lead nurturing processes.

• Ability to meet daily/weekly activity and performance targets.

• Excellent verbal communication skills with confidence in cold outreach.

• Highly organized with strong attention to detail.

• Comfortable working in a fast-paced, metrics-driven environment.

• Reliable internet connection and remote work setup.

- Monitor competitors and marketplace trends.

- Ensure compliance with marketplace policies and standards.

- Collaborate with the Marketing team to optimize demand, funnels, and conversions while scaling livestream, affiliate, and KOL/KOC commerce.

- Communication with Key Account Managers.

- Leading PH team, collaborating with other multicultural teams, and managing external partners.

- Background in fast-growing or high-volume e-commerce businesses.

- Strong understanding of online sales, promotions, and analytics.

- Knowledge of paid ads within marketplaces (Shopee Ads, Lazada Ads, TikTok Ads).

- Proficient in Google Workspace (especially Google sheets) and Excel. Managing large datasets, utilizing advanced formulas (e.g., VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables), and generating performance reports.

- Experience managing multiple SKUs and campaigns.

- Excellent communication and leadership skills.

- Data-driven mindset with strong problem-solving abilities.



Benefits:

Monitor, analyze, and report on performance metrics (reach, engagement, conversions) with a focus on continuous

optimization.

Collaborate closely with internal teams to ensure influencer and affiliate initiatives are aligned with brand objectives and

campaign goals.



Requirements:

2+ years of hands-on macro influencer marketing experience, ideally in fashion or streetwear.

Strong written and verbal communication skills. Clear, persuasive, and professional.

Excellent negotiation and relationship management abilities.

Highly organized, detail-oriented, and data-driven, with a strong analytical mindset.

Deep understanding of youth culture, streetwear trends, and the influencer landscape.

Patient, diligent, and committed to sourcing quality influencers, not just quantity.

A proven ability to track and document previous campaigns, results, and learnings.



What We’re Looking For:

A proven track record of successful influencer campaigns. We expect you to send us a tracker or portfolio showcasing

Your previous work.

Strong analytical and reporting skills, with the ability to turn data into actionable insights.

An existing network of influencer contacts or a clear strategy for sourcing culturally aligned, high-quality talent quickly.

Cultural awareness and an instinct for trend-spotting.

A patient, thoughtful approach to vetting influencers to ensure brand alignment.



How to Apply? Please record a 2–4 minute video answering the following questions:



If you joined our team tomorrow, how would you find Macro Influencers that can generate content suitable for paid advertising for a fashion brand within your first 30 days?



Applications without a video will not be reviewed.

title: Dispatch Director / Dispatch Operations Manager
description:
Pay: ?592.70 - ?889.05 per hour



Job description:



Dispatch Director / Dispatch Operations Manager



Multi-Entity 24/7 Security Operations

Remote | High Accountability | Mission-Critical Role



Compensation



USD $10–$15 per hour, based on experience and performance

Employment Type



Full-Time | Remote

24/7 Operational Role (365 days/year coverage model)

Role Summary



The Dispatch Director / Dispatch Operations Manager owns end-to-end control of live dispatch operations across multiple security companies, brands, and client portfolios operating 24/7.



This is not a single-account role.

This is not a single-company role.



You operate as the central command layer across all entities, ensuring that:



All client sites are covered

All guard communications are accurate and professional

All emergencies are escalated correctly and immediately

All dispatchers are compliant, accountable, and performing

No coverage gaps, misinformation, or operational surprises occur

This role requires high judgment, discipline, emotional control, and total ownership.



Operational Scope



You will:



Manage dispatch operations across multiple security entities

Support multiple client portfolios simultaneously

Oversee live dispatchers, AI agents, and hybrid workflows

Coordinate daily with:

Service Coordination

Field Supervisors

Recruiting

Accounting / Payroll

Executive Leadership

Dispatch is a mission-critical function. Failure at dispatch directly causes:



Client churn

Contract termination

Financial loss

Legal exposure

This role exists to prevent that at all costs.



Core Responsibilities1. Live Dispatch Command



Oversee all live dispatch activity (calls, SMS, AI-handled requests)

Ensure all inbound guard, client, and emergency communications are handled correctly

Maintain professionalism, clarity, and accuracy at all times

Prevent dropped calls, delayed responses, and misinformation

2. Multi-Entity Coverage Control



Monitor coverage across all companies and active client sites

Identify potential coverage gaps before they occur

Coordinate immediately with Service Coordination to close gaps

Escalate unresolved risks without delay

3. Escalation Management



Enforce escalation protocols across all entities

Ensure emergencies are escalated instantly

Ensure non-emergency issues are routed correctly

Document escalations and resolutions for leadership visibility

4. Dispatch Team Leadership



Supervise live dispatchers and dispatch supervisors

Enforce strict adherence to Dispatch SOPs

Correct performance issues immediately

Eliminate ambiguity, freelancing, and inconsistent behavior

5. AI & CRM Operations



Operate daily inside GoHighLevel

Manage AI dispatch and guard-line agents (SMS and voice)

Ensure AI-generated tasks route to the correct owner

Verify tasks are acknowledged, worked, and closed properly

6. Accountability & Transparency



Maintain accurate dispatch logs and records

Ensure all i
, calls, and messages are documented

Provide clear, structured reporting to leadership

Flag risks, failures, and trends early — not after damage occurs

7. I
 & Failure Management



Lead response when things go wrong

Identify root causes of failures

Ensure corrective actions are implemented

Prevent repeat issues through process improvement

8. Training & SOP Enforcement



Train and onboard new dispatchers

Maintain and enforce Dispatch SOPs

Ensure procedures are followed consistently across all entities

Escalate broken SOPs for review and revision when necessary

Required ExperienceMinimum Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



3–5+ years in dispatch, operations, workforce management, or similar high-pressure environments

Experience managing 24/7 operations

Experience supporting multiple clients or campaigns simultaneously

Prior leadership or supervisory experience

Strong written and verbal English communication skills

Strongly Preferred



Security industry experience

Call center, NOC, or mission-critical operations experience

GoHighLevel or comparable CRM experience

Familiarity with AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, automation workflows)

Required Skills & Traits



Extreme ownership mentality

Calm, controlled decision-making under pressure

High attention to detail

Comfortable with audits, oversight, and accountability

Able to manage conflict professionally

Able to work directly with executive leadership

No defensiveness, no excuses, no emotional reactions

Work Expectations



24/7 operational mindset (with structured coverage)

Availability for emergencies and escalations

Willingness to work across time zones

Ability to prioritize multiple active issues simultaneously

Ability to operate independently without micromanagement

Authority & Accountability



This role has direct operational authority over dispatch.



You are accountable for:



Coverage failures

Dispatch miscommunication

Escalation breakdowns

Unreported risks

Lack of transparency

If something fails under dispatch — this role owns it.



Performance Expectations



Success in this role looks like:



No surprise coverage gaps

Clean, enforced escalation paths

Calm, professional dispatch operations

Strong collaboration with Service Coordination and Accounting

Executive leadership confidence in dispatch integrity

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent



Benefits:





Paid training

Work from home

Experience:





Dispatch Mangagement: 3 years (Required)

Security: 1 year (Required)

Work Location: Remote

title: Health eCommerce Creative Strategist
description:
*** DO NOT APPLY IF YOU DON'T HAVE:***

- EXPERIENCE WITH SUPPLEMENT 



NOTE: SPAMMERS WILL BE REPORTED



_________________

We are a fast-growing premium supplement brand focused on science-backed formulations, longevity, and performance optimization. Our mission is to build category-defining products supported by strong education, compelling storytelling, and high-converting creative.



We are now looking for a Creative Strategist with proven supplement experience who understands how to translate health science into persuasive, compliant, high-performing ad creatives.



This is not an entry-level role. We are looking for someone who has already built and scaled winning campaigns in the supplement space.



Role Overview



As our Creative Strategist, you will own the ideation and direction of performance-driven ad creatives across Meta, (maybe TikTok, YouTube, and other paid channels in the future)



You must understand:



• Supplement consumer psychology

• Compliance limitations in health claims

• UGC scripting and hooks

• Direct response frameworks

• Performance metrics such as CTR, thumb stop rate, CPA, and ROAS



Your job is simple in theory and demanding in execution: develop creatives that convert.



Responsibilities



• Develop high-converting ad concepts based on data and competitor research

• Write scroll-stopping hooks and scripts for UGC and founder ads

• Build creative briefs for video editors and content creators

• Analyze ad performance and iterate quickly

• Identify winning angles and scale them

• Conduct competitive analysis within the supplement space

• Align creative with brand positioning and long-term growth strategy



Requirements



• Proven experience working with supplement brands (mandatory)

• Demonstrated track record of winning ad creatives

• Strong understanding of Meta and TikTok ad ecosystems

• Ability to balance compliance with persuasive messaging

• Experience scaling offers such as subscriptions, bundles, or AOV lifts

• Data-driven mindset



Application Requirements:



To be considered, you must submit:

1. Portfolio of previous supplement brands you’ve worked with

2. Examples of winning ads (video links preferred)

3. Performance metrics where possible (CPA, ROAS, CTR, etc.)

4. Brief explanation of why the creatives worked

5. Your availability and rate



Applications without supplement experience will not be considered.



What We Offer



• Fast-moving team with strong growth ambitions

• Long-term opportunity with performance upside

• Freedom to test bold ideas backed by data

• Collaborative, execution-focused culture



If you understand how to sell supplements without sounding like everyone else in the market, we want to hear from you.



Apply by sending your portfolio and best performing creatives.

title: Product Researcher & Lister & Store Builder - Full-Time Position
description:
Full application here







Remote Ecom Operator (Dropshipping) — Run the Full Playbook End-to-End



SOPS please read before hand.















## Remote Ecom Operator (Dropshipping) — Run the Full Playbook End-to-End



We’re hiring a **hands-on, end-to-end dropshipping operator** to execute our complete operating system from **niche selection product research  supplier sourcing  store build  ads testing  fulfillment. This is not a “VA” role—this is an **owner-operator** style execution seat using a defined SOP playbook. 



### What you’ll be responsible for (end-to-end)



#### 1) Niche selection & market validation



* Use a structured niche scoring + validation process (Reddit + Google Trends + Amazon + TikTok signals) to pick testable niches. 



#### 2) Product research & competitor intelligence



* Run winning-product research using spy tools + checklists (e.g., Minea/PiPiADS + validation criteria). 

* Build product test shortlists, document competitors, extract angles/hooks, and recommend go/no-go decisions.



#### 3) Supplier sourcing, vetting & backup suppliers



* Source suppliers (CJ/AutoDS/Zendrop/Spocket/AliExpress/Alibaba as needed), vet with clear standards, and maintain **at least 2 suppliers per winning product**. 

* Confirm shipping methods/timelines and ensure policy-safe claims + realistic customer expectations.



#### 4) Shopify store build & conversion optimization



* Build/optimize Shopify store(s): theme setup, required apps, product pages, pricing, trust elements, FAQs, upsells. 

* Maintain mobile-first performance and clean customer journey (product page ? checkout ? post-purchase).



#### 5) Paid ads launch, testing & optimization (TikTok + Meta)



* Launch tests using structured testing protocols (budgeting, ad group structure, creative requirements, kill/scale rules). 

* Install pixels Day 1, monitor key metrics daily, iterate creatives fast, and pivot when data says so. 



---



## Systems & deliverables (how we work)



You will document and manage execution so work is “handoff-ready” and repeatable:



* Maintain product records, tasks, and structured research/decision packets (R0R3 style gates are a plus). 

* Keep organized folders and clear handoffs for creatives, store assets, suppliers, and performance reporting.



---



## Required experience



* Proven track record running **Shopify dropshipping or DTC testing** end-to-end (not just one slice like “product research” or “customer support”).

* Strong paid ads fundamentals: TikTok Ads + Meta Ads (testing structure, reading metrics, creative iteration, scaling decisions). 

* Comfortable owning operations: supplier coordination, fulfillment workflows, support processes, and refund/chargeback prevention. 





### Tools you are required to have and know how to use (At least 2)



Minea, PiPiADS, Meta Ad Library, Kalodata, Winning Hunter 

---



## What success looks like (core KPIs)



You will be measured on:



* Speed to launch: consistent product testing cadence (weekly/biweekly depending on scope).

* Store health: conversion rate trends, AOV improvements via upsells, refund rate control. 



---



## Role details



* **Remote / online**

* **Type:** Contract (with potential to grow into long-term operator role)

* **Hours:** Full-time 35–45 hrs/week]



  * Hourly: $1 to start

  * Performance bonus: $200 per winning product and funnel tied to net profit milestones (preferred for senior operators)



---



## How to apply



Send:



1. A short summary of your relevant wins (store results, ad spend levels, ROAS ranges, niches).

2. Links or screenshots: ad dashboards, store examples, creative examples



### Screening questions (answer in your application)



* What’s your step-by-step process to find and validate a product before spending on ads?

* Walk us through how you structure a $50/day TikTok test and what metrics d
 “kill” vs “keep.” 

* What’s your approach to reducing refunds/chargebacks in dropshipping? 

* What core
 flows do you launch first and why? 

* What tools from this stack have you personally used? 

* Full Understanding to the inital Compensation of 1USD base and 200 USD Per Validated Store/Product

* A fun fact about yourself so we know this was not written with AI

title: Ecommerce UGC Ads Video Editor (TikTok / Reels / Shorts) -Dropshipping
description:
Full application here







SALARY



150$ monthly base retainer

Plus 50 USD bonus per validated product



POSITION



FULL Time, long-term, remote

US-based ecommerce brand using a high-volume testing model (CaniCol v2.2)



ABOUT THE ROLE



We are building a creative engine where volume and speed matter. Our CaniCol model tests many products every month using strict rules and lean budgets. Creatives are the main fuel.



We are hiring one dedicated video editor to turn existing assets into short-form ads for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.





You will work only with existing footage, b-roll, product clips, images, reviews, ad library downloads, and AI tools. Your goal is to produce 100 ads per month that give us enough shots on goal to find winning products.



This role is ideal if you like high-output work, clear targets, and long-term stability.



ABOUT US AND THE CANICOL MODEL



We run a lean, volume-based dropshipping system. We test many products each month and make decisions fast based on data.



Our model focuses on:

Fast product testing with controlled budgets

High volume of creatives per product

Clear kill, pass, and scale rules

Accepting some false negatives in exchange for more total tests



Your edits plug directly into this engine. Your ads are what we run in Phase 1 and Phase 2 tests. When a product reaches validated status using your creatives, you earn a bonus. This aligns your work with our real goal: validated products and profitable campaigns.



We work with Slack, ClickUp or Notion, and Google Drive. You will receive clear briefs and assets, and we will give feedback based on real ad performance such as hook rate and click through rate.



MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES



You will edit 100 short-form video ads per month. Each video is usually 15 to 35 seconds, vertical 9:16 format, for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts.



You will work only from existing assets. Examples include competitor ads from TikTok and Meta Ad Libraries, supplier or manufacturer videos, product b-roll, product photos, customer reviews, screenshots, stock clips, and AI generated or AI assisted clips.



You will create multiple variations from the same base assets. This means trying different hooks in the first 1 to 3 seconds, different scene order and pacing, and different angles and calls to action.



You will add strong direct response elements. This includes clear on screen text, readable subtitles, benefit driven captions, problem and solution framing, social proof, and urgency when appropriate.



You will export files correctly and keep all files named and organized following our structure in Google Drive.



You will make fast revisions when we see what is working and what is not. When a product shows good signals, we will ask you for more variations quickly so we can push it through the CaniCol gates.



REQUIRED SKILLS



You must have experience editing short-form vertical videos for platforms such as TikTok, Instagram Reels, or YouTube Shorts.



You must be able to edit using at least one of the following: CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.



You must understand pacing and hooks. You know that the first 1 to 3 seconds d
 whether people keep watching or scroll.



You must be comfortable working completely from existing footage and from AI tools. This is an editing and repurposing role, not a filming role.



You must be able to create clean subtitles and on-screen text in clear English.



You must have a reliable computer and stable internet connection that can handle video editing work.



SOFT SKILLS WE VALUE



You follow instructions very carefully and care about details such as file names and structure.



You hit deadlines and weekly output targets without needing to be chased.



You are open to direct feedback and can adjust your style based on performance data and comments.



You ask questions when something is unclear instead of guessing and wasting time.



You want a long-term, stable role and are not just looking for a quick project.



COMPENSATION AND GROWTH



Pay is 150USD per month retainer in exchange for 80 edited short-form ads for the first month. After proven, retainer will increase.



You also receive a 50 USD bonus for each validated product. A product is considered validated when campaigns using your creatives hit our internal performance targets over several days at proper ad spend. We will share these rules clearly in writing so you know exactly what has to happen for a product to count as validated.



As your creatives help us find more winning products, we will review your base pay and bonus structure. There is potential for higher pay and for you to become a lead editor in the future.



We pay on time and review performance regularly.



WORK SCHEDULE AND SETUP



This is a part-time, long-term, remote role.



You can set your own schedule as long as you consistently deliver your weekly output and can overlap at least 2 to 3 hours with US Eastern Time on agreed days for feedback calls or messages.



You will use Slack for communication, Google Drive for assets and exports, and ClickUp or Notion for tasks. You will use your own editing software.



HOW TO APPLY



OnlineJobs.ph subject line requirement:



Use this exact subject line when you apply:

BLUE – Short-Form Ads Video Editor



In the body of your application, include the following in plain text:



First, a short introduction of 3 to 5 sentences. Tell us who you are, your experience with short-form ads, and why a high volume, repurposing focused role like this fits you.



Second, links to 3 to 6 examples of your work. These should be vertical short-form videos. Ad style edits are preferred. You can send Google Drive links, TikTok or Instagram profiles, or YouTube links. If any of these performed well in terms of views or sales, mention that.



Third, answer these questions in simple text:

What editing software do you use every day?

How many 15 to 30 second ads can you realistically edit in a full working day at good quality?

Have you worked with ecommerce, dropshipping, or DTC brands before? If yes, what did you do?

Have you used TikTok or Meta Ad Library before to study or repurpose ads?

Are you comfortable with 150$ per month base pay plus 50 USD per validated product and an output of 80-100 ads per month?



Fourth, describe your setup. Write your computer specs including CPU, RAM, and GPU if you have one. Also tell us your internet speed. You can paste your speedtest result if you want.



Fifth, optional but a big plus. You may send a 1 to 2 minute Loom or unlisted YouTube video where you show one ad you edited and explain how you built the hook, the middle, and the call to action.



HIRING PROCESS



We will first review applications that follow all instructions and use the correct subject line.



We will then shortlist candidates based on portfolio, clarity of answers, and fit for a high-volume testing environment.



Shortlisted candidates will be invited to a paid test project using our assets.



After the test project, we will choose one editor for a one month paid trial. If both sides are happy after the trial, we will continue on a long-term basis.



If you want a long-term, data driven editing role where your work is directly tied to validated products and bonuses, we invite you to apply.

title: Executive Virtual Assistant | Multi-Company Business Development Support
description:
About the Role

I run a portfolio of four companies across branding, defence advisory, healthcare infrastructure, and software/AI. I need a sharp, self-directed VA to own the operational layer of business development across all four. This is not a data entry role. You will be the engine behind LinkedIn outreach, CRM pipeline management, meeting coordination,
 drafting, cold outreach campaigns, and research. You will work directly with me and my PA.

I use AI tools (Claude) extensively and expect you to as well. If you've never used AI tools in your workflow, this isn't the right fit. If you've used them and found they make you faster and better, keep reading.



What You Will Do Every Day

- Build targeted prospect lists using Claude AI and research tools, then execute LinkedIn outreach under my account (with strict safety protocols).

- Manage our Airtable CRM: create origination entries, move contacts through the pipeline, coordinate with my PA on meeting scheduling, and create deals when opportunities arise.

- Draft
s and follow-ups in my voice and tone. You'll be trained on my writing style and expected to match it closely.

 - Run structured cold outreach campaigns end-to-end: list building, template drafting, sending, tracking, and follow-up sequences.

- Deliver daily output logs with specific activity numbers. No tracking software. Your outputs speak for themselves.



What I Need From You

- Proven VA experience supporting a founder, CEO, or senior executive. Not a team. Not a department. A person who moves fast and expects you to keep up.

- Airtable proficiency (or the ability to learn it in days, not weeks). If you've built automations in Airtable before, say so. If you haven't but you've done similar work in 
, HubSpot, or another CRM, that counts.

- LinkedIn outreach experience. You understand connection limits, the importance of VPN/dedicated IP, and how to write messages that don't sound like spam.

- Strong written English. Not perfect grammar for the sake of it. I need you to write
s that sound like a real person, not a template. Warm, direct, professional.

- AI tool literacy. You use ChatGPT, Claude, or similar tools proactively in your work. Bonus if you've used Claude's Co-Worker/Projects features.

- Judgment. You know the difference between something you can handle yourself, something you should flag, and something that needs to be escalated immediately.



What I Need From You

- Proven VA experience supporting a founder, CEO, or senior executive. Not a team. Not a department. A person who moves fast and expects you to keep up.

- Airtable proficiency (or the ability to learn it in days, not weeks). If you've built automations in Airtable before, say so. If you haven't but you've done similar work in 
, HubSpot, or another CRM, that counts.

- LinkedIn outreach experience. You understand connection limits, the importance of VPN/dedicated IP, and how to write messages that don't sound like spam.

- Strong written English. Not perfect grammar for the sake of it. I need you to write
s that sound like a real person, not a template. Warm, direct, professional.

- AI tool literacy. You use ChatGPT, Claude, or similar tools proactively in your work. Bonus if you've used Claude's Co-Worker/Projects features.

- Judgment. You know the difference between something you can handle yourself, something you should flag, and something that needs to be escalated immediately.



How to Apply

- Do not send a generic cover letter. Instead, reply with the following:

- Your name and a one-paragraph summary of the most relevant VA role you've held. Specifically tell me: who you supported (founder/CEO/team), what tools you used daily, and one example of a task you owned end-to-end without needing to be managed.

- Rate your Airtable proficiency from 1 to 10 and explain your rating in one sentence.

- Rate your LinkedIn outreach experience from 1 to 10 and explain your rating in one sentence.

- Have you used Claude AI (by Anthropic) before? If yes, describe one task you used it for. If no, that's fine, but say so.

Include the phrase "I read the full posting" at the very start of your application, before anything else. Applications without this will not be reviewed.

About PropFix.ie



PropFix.ie is Ireland's trusted property maintenance specialist, offering comprehensive solutions with years of expertise across the construction and renovation sectors. We transform spaces through our diverse range of services, from handyman solutions and office fit-outs to complete renovations, house extensions, and specialized installations including doors, floors, and partitions.

Professional Skills

title: VIDEO EDITOR
description:
About the Job:

We're a hair education brand looking for a skilled video editor to transform 10 professionally recorded full-length haircut tutorial videos into engaging short-form content for Instagram Reels and TikTok. You'll be responsible for repurposing this footage into a variety of content formats including before & after reveals, tips & tricks clips, full process breakdowns, satisfying transformations, and trending-style edits. The goal is to create scroll-stopping content that educates and entertains, helping us grow our audience across social platforms. This is an ongoing remote position with potential for long-term collaboration as we produce more content.



Ideal Candidate:

You're someone who lives and breathes short-form video. You understand what makes people stop scrolling on TikTok and Reels, and you know how to structure a 15–60 second clip for maximum engagement. You have experience editing beauty, grooming, or education content and can take raw tutorial footage and turn it into multiple unique pieces without being told exactly what to do you bring creative ideas to the table. You stay on top of trends, know how to use text overlays, captions, sound design, and pacing to keep viewers hooked, and you take pride in delivering polished work on time.



Job Requirements:

Proven experience editing short-form content for TikTok and/or Instagram Reels (portfolio or samples required)

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or DaVinci Resolve

Strong understanding of social media trends, hooks, transitions, and pacing for short-form video

Ability to add captions, text overlays, sound effects, and music in a clean, professional way

Experience repurposing long-form content into multiple short-form clips

Reliable internet connection and ability to handle large video files remotely

Strong communication skills and ability to meet deadlines consistently

Experience in the beauty, barbering, or hair education niche is a plus but not required



Hiring Process:

To ensure we find the right fit, shortlisted candidates will receive one sample video from our library. You'll be asked to create a short-form edit (Reel or TikTok style) using that footage to showcase your creativity, editing skills, and understanding of our content style. The final hiring decision will be based on the quality of your sample edit. This is your chance to impress us, show us what you can do!

title: Expert E-Commerce VA & AI Obsessed
description:
About Us:

We are Lairos – a fast-growing, premium DTC brand based in the US. We transfor
dical necessities into empowering choices by creating specialized knee-high socks for children who wear AFO braces.



We are obsessed with AI. We use it to move faster, work smarter, and scale. Whoever joins us will become an absolute AI Master. As part of this role, you will be given access to Gemini Pro to help you execute your tasks. We expect you to be highly independent, know how to prompt effectively, and use AI to solve problems on your own.



The Role (20 Hours/Week | Flexible Hours):

You can work your own hours, as long as the job gets done flawlessly. All communication is 100% written English. This role starts as part-time, but there is a strong option to transition to Full-Time with a salary increase at the end of the year, depending on our success and collaboration.



Your main focus areas will be:



1. Partnerships & Clinic Outreach (Top Priority): While we sell primarily online, we collaborate heavily with medical clinics and practices. You will reach out to them to offer two partnership options: carrying our product in their clinic, or receiving flyers with exclusive promo codes for their patients. This is not classic "hard sales" – it’s about relationship-building. It requires top-tier organization and tracking skills.

title: CR Tool Developer (Python +
description:
About the Role



We are building an AI-driven platform that analyses bank statements to extract and structure financial data accurately.

We already use Google Document AI (Bank Statement Parser), and we’re looking for a skilled developer to build a robust OCR and data-processing tool that can interpret PDFs and scanned documents with high precision.



Job Overview



You will build an OCR parsing pipeline that can:



Extract data from PDF bank statements (both scanned and digital).



Normalise and clean the data into a standard schema.



Validate accuracy using logical rules (balance continuity, reversals, missing pages).



Integrate the parsed output into our existing backend.



Tech Skills Required



Strong Python development skills (minimum 2 years).



Experience with Google Document AI or other OCR APIs (AWS Textract, Azure Form Recognizer, etc.).



Knowledge of pdfplumber, PyMuPDF, Tesseract, or Camelot for table extraction.



Comfortable building FastAPI or Flask endpoints.



JSON data handling, validation, and schema mapping.



Familiar with Google Cloud Platform (API keys, credentials, storage).



Excellent attention to detail and testing discipline.



Your Deliverables



End-to-end OCR tool (upload ? parse ? output JSON/CSV).



Fallback logic for scanned PDFs (switch between Google DocAI and local OCR).



Normalised transaction schema with consistent data structure.



Logic that ensures reversals are negative and balances align across pages.



Accuracy and validation report.



Dockerised FastAPI app or API endpoint for integration.



Nice to Have



Familiarity with Supabase or 
v.



Experience parsing financial documents (bank statements, invoices, receipts).



Experience building simple internal dashboards (React/Vue or basic HTML UI).



Salary Range



?40,000 – ?90,000 / month (depending on experience).

Higher rates considered for candidates with proven OCR or Document AI expertise.



How to Apply



Please include the following in your application:



A short paragraph explaining how you would build a highly accurate OCR parser for bank statements.



Examples or GitHub links to OCR or document-parsing projects you’ve worked on.



Your expected monthly salary and availability.

title: Job Title: Senior Financial Controller (CRE & Forensic Cleanup Expert) – $2,500-$3,000/mo
description:
We are looking for a high-level Financial Controller with a "Forensic" mindset to take ownership of a fast-growing US Commercial Real Estate firm.



Our books currently need significant cleanup dating back to October 2023 across 40+ properties and 4 parent entities. We need a "Fixer" who can walk into a mess, build the systems to repair it, and then lead the accounting department long-term.



The Schedule (Early Morning PH Shift)

Core Collaboration Window: 3:00 PM – 6:00 PM US Central Time (Equivalent to 5:00 AM – 8:00 AM PHT).



Flexible Hours: The remaining 5 hours of your shift can be worked flexibly around this core window.



Days: Monday – Friday (US Business Days).



Phase 1: The Cleanup (Months 1–6)

Forensic Reconstruction: Reconcile all GL entries and intercompany balances dating back to Oct 2023.



System Design: Audit 24 months of credit card activity and implement a brand-new management/coding workflow.



Control Framework: Design and document the Month-End Close process and AP/AR internal controls.



Audit Readiness: Prepare clean, supportable schedules for our US-based CPA firm.



Phase 2: Ongoing Controller Operations (Month 7+)

Drive a Day-5 Close: Lead the team to a rapid and accurate monthly close.



Property Accounting: Manage CAM reconciliations, owner statements, and property-level reporting for 40+ assets.



Brokerage Support: Provide financial modeling (Lease vs. Buy, IRR analysis) for our brokerage team.



Leadership: Oversee and elevate the performance of our existing Bookkeeper.



Qualifications (Strictly Required)

Experience: 7+ years in accounting, with 3+ years specifically in US Real Estate (Property Management or Brokerage).



Software: AppFolio Expert status is mandatory. Deep proficiency in QuickBooks Online and Excel (Advanced).



Skillset: Proven track record of cleaning up messy/neglected books for multi-entity structures.



Communication: "Executive-level" English. You must be comfortable advising the CEO and COO.



Technical Setup: Must have a primary fiber connection (50Mbps+), a backup internet source (Starlink/ISP), and a power backup (UPS/Generator).



Preferred Qualifications

Philippine CPA or US CMA certification.



Experience with CAM reconciliations and NNN leases.



Previous experience in a "Big 4" audit firm (PwC, EY, etc.).



Why Join Us?

High-Level Ownership: You aren't just a number; you are a key strategic partner to the US leadership.



Competitive Salary: We pay for top-tier talent ($2,500 – $3,000 USD per month depending on experience).



Stability: This is a long-term, permanent career move with a growing US firm.



Benefits: Paid Time Off



How to Apply



Please include the word "FORENSIC" in your subject line or the first line of your cover letter so we know you read this. In your application, please address:



A specific example of a "messy" set of books you successfully cleaned up.



Your specific experience level with AppFolio and Quickbooks



Confirmation that you have the required internet and power redundancies.



Your desired monthly salary in USD.

Nik Setting (

Instagram

title: Experienced Video Creator Needed (Project-Based, Urgent) – E-book to Video Content
description:
About the Project



We are urgently looking for a highly skilled and experienced Video Creator who can transform our E-book content into engaging, professional video content. The video will be based directly on our E-book and should effectively communicate the message in a clear, compelling, and visually appealing way.



This is a project-based role only.



Responsibilities

-Create high-quality video content based on the provided E-book

-Translate written content into engaging visual storytelling

-Add appropriate visuals, animations, text overlays, transitions, and background music

-Ensure the video aligns with our brand style and messaging

-Deliver polished, professional-quality output ready for publishing

-Meet deadlines and communicate progress clearly



Requirements

-Proven experience in video creation and editing

-Strong storytelling and visual communication skills

-Ability to interpret written content and convert it into engaging video format

-Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, Final Cut, or similar)

-Strong attention to detail and professionalism

-Reliable and able to meet deadlines



Preferred Qualifications

-Experience creating videos based on educational content, E-books, or scripts

-Experience with motion graphics and animated text

-Experience creating videos for marketing, ads, or social media



To Apply, Please Send:

-Your portfolio link (REQUIRED) – applications without portfolio will not be considered

-Your rate (per video or per project)

-Your turnaround time for one video

-Your video editing software/tools used

-Your years of experience in video creation



Important Notes

-This is an urgent project

-Only experienced video creators should apply

-This is a project-based role, but there may be opportunities for future projects

-We look forward to working with a talented video creator who can bring our E-book content to life through video.

title: Junior Operations Coordinator IMMEDIATE OPENING
description:
Date With the Muse



[
](
)



If you can commit to and live with the following principles, then you are the type of person who will be successful and help our company thrive. If you feel this level of engagement is not right for you or that you’re not willing or able to participate with us at this level, we are not a good fit for you.



Our expectation is that you will take the steps necessary to do what you say you are going to do and be accountable for your actions. You are committed to excellence and take pride in a job well done.



We understand that not every person is ready for this level of performance and we appreciate the honesty of those who d
 this is not the right place for them. On the other hand, you would make an ideal candidate to join our company if you are willing to commit to the following principles:



- Accountability: see it, own it, solve it, do it

- Become part of the solution

- Respect for others and their feelings

- Act now.

- Ask the question: “What else can I do?”

- Ask the questions: “What coaching do you have for me?” and “What can I do better?”

- Personal ownership and pride

- Reject average

- Show others that you care



This is not a virtual assistant role.



This is a structured operational coordination role for someone with project management or operations experience who understands sequencing, readiness, and follow-through.



You are not here to “help where needed.”



You are here to ensure the company runs cleanly.



---



## The Real Role



You are the traffic controller of the company’s time resource.



Your responsibility is to ensure:



- The right people are in the right place

- At the right time

- With the right materials

- Fully prepared



Across clients, coaches, the CEO, and potential clients.



Meetings do not proceed without readiness.



Deadlines do not pass silently.



Follow-ups do not disappear.



You protect operational flow.





 Core Responsibilities



 1 Calendar & Readiness Enforcement



You do not just manage calendars.



You:



- Perform pre-meeting readiness checks

- Confirm prerequisites are complete

- Ensure materials are attached in advance

- Validate participant readiness

- Prevent dependency errors

- Escalate when sequencing is wrong



If a meeting is not ready, it does not proceed.



-

2 Cross-Team Coordination



You ensure:



- Coaches have what they need before sessions

- Clients receive required prep materials

- The CEO is not blindsided

- Deliverables are tracked and owned

- Commitments are visible

- Follow-ups are documented and confirmed



You are the continuity layer between tea
mbers.



You prevent dropped balls before they fall.







3 Client & Team Communication



Strong written communication is essential.



You must be able to:



- Write clear, concise updates

- Ask clarifying questions

- Confirm understanding before execution

- Document decisions accurately

- Escalate professionally without drama

- Communicate boundaries clearly



You do not assume.



You confirm.



---



4 Help Desk & Operational Support



You:



- Route tickets accurately

- Respond using existing SOPs

- Escalate policy-related issues

- Identify recurring friction patterns

- Flag documentation gaps



You protect the client experience from preventable errors.



---



 5 Execution with Verification



You:



- Follow checklists precisely

- Test links before marking tasks complete

- Verify time zones and views

- Attach proof of completion

- Complete recurring tasks without prompting



If it’s on the checklist, it gets done.



Without reminders.



---



Non-Negotiable Traits



- Strong executive function

- Exceptional follow-through

- Structured thinking

- Pattern recognition

- Calm escalation when unclear

- High personal accountability

- Clear, concise written communication

- No reassurance-seeking submissions



You do not require reminders to complete standard work.



---



 What This Role Is NOT



- Not an inbox babysitting job

- Not a creative improvisation role

- Not a “help wherever needed” assistant

- Not a reminder-dependent position

- Not a reactive firefighter role



---



KPIs



- 100% of repeat tasks completed without prompting

- 0 preventable client-facing errors

- Meetings occur only when ready

- Escalations happen before deadlines

- No “Was this done?” follow-ups required

- Clear written updates with minimal back-and-forth



---



30 / 60 / 90 Days



**30 Days**



- Master core SOPs

- Run repeat tasks independently

- Demonstrate clean written communication



**60 Days**



- Independently manage ticket flow

- Enforce readiness standards consistently

- No repeat execution errors



**90 Days**



- Fully trusted operational filter

- Prevents issues before escalation

- Ensures the CEO’s time is protected



---



Who This Is For



You likely have:



- Project management or operations coordination experience

- A track record of reliable process execution

- Comfort enforcing standards

- Pride in zero-defect work

- Strong written communication skills

- Experience managing sequencing and dependencies



You enjoy being the stabilizer in a fast-moving environment.



---



## Who Should Not Apply



- If you need reminders to follow procedures

- If you frequently miss checklist items

- If you avoid escalating unclear situations

- If you prefer improvisation over structure

- If you struggle with consistent communication



---



## Growth Path



Strong performers who demonstrate systems thinking and communication clarity may grow into broader operational responsibility over time.



Execution discipline comes first.



---



---



## To Apply



Qualified applicants are encouraged to apply as soon as possible. To express interest please submit 



a cover letter addressed to the CEO detailing why you are uniquely qualified for this role,



a resume,



and a DISC profile 



 materials to 
 with the headline OPS



Interviews will be conducted on a rolling basis. This position begins ASAP for the right candidate. 



Applications received through this platform/website will not move forward.



---

title: Creator Outreach
description:
We are looking for a driven and highly organized Creator Outreach Specialist to help us scale our paid advertising ecosystem. This role is focused entirely on outbound communication and opportunity generation. Your main responsibility is to identify, contact, and secure collaborations with content creators who can produce high-quality user generated content for our brand. This content will later be used in paid advertising campaigns.

Your primary focus is outreach. You will research relevant creators across platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, reach out to them via
, present collaboration opportunities in a clear and professional manner, and follow up consistently. Your objective is to start conversations, build initial interest, and convert prospects into confirmed collaborations. Once a creator agrees to work with us and the initial coordination is handled, the relationship and further communication will be transferred to another tea
mber. You are not responsible for long-term management, ad execution, or ongoing creator communication. Your responsibility is pipeline growth and prospect generation.

Success in this role means maintaining consistent daily outreach volume, achieving strong response rates, and securing a steady flow of qualified creators who align with our brand standards. You must be comfortable sending a high number of
s each day, handling rejection professionally, and staying persistent with follow-ups. Organization is critical, as you will track all communication and outcomes in our internal systems to ensure smooth handoffs to the team.

The ideal candidate is proactive, confident in written communication, performance-driven, and resilient. You should be comfortable working independently, managing your own output targets, and continuously improving your messaging based on feedback and results. An interest in e-commerce, paid media, and the creator economy is important, as this role directly impacts our advertising performance. Experience in influencer marketing, UGC outreach, or sales is a strong advantage, but the most important qualities are discipline, clarity in communication, and a results-oriented mindset.

This position offers base compensation with performance-based incentives tied to secured collaborations, along with the opportunity to grow into more advanced acquisition or partnership roles as the company scales. If you thrive in outbound environments and enjoy opening conversations that turn into revenue-generating partnerships, this role is built for you.

title: Dynamics 365 Project Operations – Developer / Tier 2 Support
description:
DYNAMICS 365 PROJECT OPERATIONS – DEVELOPER / TIER 2 SUPPORT

Level: Mid–Senior

Type: Post-Implementation Support & Extension Role

Remote | Full-Time



ROLE OVERVIEW



We are hiring ONE experienced professional to support and extend our live Microsoft Dynamics 365 environment.



This is a combined Developer + Tier 2 Support role focused on stabilizing and enhancing an already implemented system — NOT a net-new build.



Primary focus areas include D365 Project Operations, Power Pages, integrations and API troubleshooting, and production support.



You will act as a key escalation point and own issues from investigation through resolution.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Provide Tier 2 production support for Dynamics 365.

Troubleshoot platform, configuration, data, and integration issues.

Support D365 Project Operations including projects, resources, time and expense.

Deliver light customizations and targeted enhancements.

Troubleshoot API integrations including Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions.

Own and maintain Power Pages including security, forms, and authentication.

Support Power Automate flows and model-driven app updates.

Coordinate with vendors and internal stakeholders.

Document issues, resolutions, and support procedures.



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE – MUST HAVE



Hands-on support experience with Dynamics 365 in a production environment.

Strong Dataverse knowledge including tables, relationships, and security roles.

Functional experience with D365 Project Operations.

title: Screen video creator
description:
I need someone to create around 60 screen recordings of LinkedIn profiles.



Goal

For each profile, record the posted content covering the period 1 January 2025 through 31 December 2025. The recording should start at the most recent posts and continue scrolling until the timeline reaches 1 January 2025, so the entire year 2025 is captured.



Process

- I will share a list of the LinkedIn profiles you need to record.

- I will provide credentials for the screen recording software.



For each profile:

- Open the profile.

- Start the screen recording.

- Scroll down at a steady pace until you reach posts dated 1 January 2025.

- Stop the recording and save the file.

- Repeat the same steps for all profiles on the list.

title: YouTube Editor
description:
Location: Remote

Type: Part-time contractor (with potential to grow)

Compensation: Competitive monthly retainer based on experience



About Me & The Business



I run a high-ticket coaching program that helps people dramatically reduce or eliminate daily anxiety and feel “calm and normal” again. We work mostly with people who’ve tried the usual advice and still wake up with a racing mind and tight chest.



I’m rebuilding the business around a simple, direct-response funnel:



Paid ads ? application ? booked call ? client



Content is a key part of that. I do weekly livestreams, client sessions, and trainings. I need someone who can turn that raw footage into clear, compelling assets that build trust and book more calls.



The Role



You’ll be my core video editor. Your job is NOT to make things “cinematic.” Your job is to:



Turn my raw content (livestreams + client calls + proof) into videos that keep attention and help lower CAC (cost to acquire a client).



Weekly, you will:



Take 1 long-form piece (usually a Thursday live or training)

Take selected client sessions / proof clips

Deliver a set of finished assets that can be used in:

YouTube / podcast

Social / ads

Lead nurture (texts/emails before calls)

Your Responsibilities



Every week you will:



Create 1 long-form video (8–15 minutes)



Teaching, breakdown, or case study.

Clean structure: hook, context, teaching, examples, CTA.

Create 2–3 short-form videos (30–90 seconds each)



At least one is a concrete client win / testimonial.

At least one is a “tiny win” or reframe that anxious people can use immediately.

Optionally one objection-buster (time, money, “I’ve tried everything,” etc.).

Edit for clarity and retention



Strong hooks in first 1–3 seconds.

Tight pacing, no fluff.

Simple captions, titles, and pattern interrupts that help understanding, not distract.

Be self-managing



Take a clear brief and turn it into finished assets with minimal back-and-forth.

Organize files and deliverables logically each week.

Hit deadlines consistently.

You Are a Fit If…



You have 2+ years editing long and short-form video for online creators, coaches, or info products.

You understand direct-response style content: hooks, offers, CTAs, proof.

You care more about watch time, clarity, and sales impact than fancy transitions.

You can work from a Loom brief or written notes without needing your hand held.

You can hit a weekly content pack on time, every time.

Big plus if:



You’ve edited content in the mental health / self-improvement / coaching space.

You can show before/after examples of how you improved pacing, hooks, or structure.

What Success Looks Like (First 90 Days)



Every week, I get:

1 long-form video and 2–3 shorts that I can post or use in ads with no major edits.

We start to see:

Better hooks and watch time on content,

Strong proof assets we can plug into landing pages and ads,

A growing library of usable clips from client wins.

title: Customer Experience Manager
description:
Scahlps Studio is a luxury hair extension brand seeking a highly detail-oriented and emotionally intelligent Customer Experience Manager to oversee all client communication across
 and Instagram. This is not entry-level customer service. This role requires someone who understands brand protection, professionalism, urgency, discretion, and policy enforcement.

The Customer Experience Manager will be responsible for responding to all customer
s in a timely and brand-aligned tone, managing order inquiries, billing questions, and shipping updates, processing returns according to company policy, reviewing and confirming authorization statements for flagged orders, editing orders when necessary before fulfillment, and providing product recommendations based on customer needs. This role includes clearly communicating preorder timelines, reinforcing that preorders are final sale, and ensuring customers understand the difference between preorder and restock shipping dates. The candidate must handle situations where customers have not received tracking numbers, verify delivery statuses, open and manage ShipSurance claims for lost or delayed packages, and follow up consistently until cases are resolved.



The role also requires managing Instagram direct messages and comment sections. This includes responding professionally and efficiently to all DMs, addressing questions publicly when appropriate, de-escalating difficult customers calmly, protecting the brand image in public comment sections, and moving complex order-specific issues to
. Public arguments are never acceptable, and tone must remain consistent with a luxury brand at all times.



Daily coordination with the fulfillment team is required to confirm order edits before shipment, verify preorder markings, ensure tracking numbers are uploaded properly, and communicate any delays accurately. After Baby Curly orders are fulfilled, the Customer Experience Manager must send the official care instructions
 along with both tutorial links and log confirmation in the order notes. This step is mandatory and non-negotiable.



Additional responsibilities include strictly enforcing return policies, confirming all returns fall within the seven-day window, verifying that items are unopened and untampered, denying any return request involving opened bundles with no exceptions, requiring tracking numbers for approved returns, inspecting returned items before refunds are issued, and processing refunds within three to five business days when eligible. The role also involves monitoring suspicious orders, identifying patterns that may indicate fraud, ensuring authorization statements are properly completed, escalating high-risk situations immediately, and maintaining a log of escalated cases. Confidentiality and brand protection are critical at all times.



The ideal candidate has prior e-commerce customer service experience, preferably within the beauty industry, and is familiar with Shopify and shipping claim processes. They must have strong written communication skills, excellent conflict resolution ability, emotional maturity, and the ability to make sound judgment calls within company policy. This person must be proactive rather than reactive, organized under pressure, consistent with tone, and comfortable enforcing strict policies without becoming defensive or overly apologetic.



All
s and DMs must be addressed within the assigned shift. No messages should be left unanswered. Accuracy in order edits, claims, and return documentation is required. This role demands consistency, accountability, and professionalism.

, and digital ads

- Create event guides and promotional materials for clients

- Maintain brand consistency across all projects

- Collaborate with the creative team and account managers

- Meet deadlines, provide revisions, and manage feedback loops

- Stay up to date with hospitality design trends and social media best practices



About Our Clients

Tulen works with a wide range of event venues, restaurants, and hospitality businesses across the U.S. Many of our clients run high-end event spaces or multi-venue restaurant groups. A strong understanding of this visual space is key.



Must-Have Skills

- 1+ years of graphic design experience

- Strong portfolio with hospitality or event-related work

- Canva proficiency (Adobe Creative Suite is a plus)

- Clear content creation skills for social media

- Experience creating both print and digital assets

- Detail-oriented with a refined design aesthetic

- Comfortable working independently with clear deadlines

- Strong communication and collaboration skills



Nice-to-Haves

- Experience with layout design (blueprints, space mockups)

- Light animation or motion design (GIFs, reels)

- Knowledge of branding, typography, and composition

- Familiarity with pitch decks or client-facing presentations



Success Metrics

- Turnaround time for active clients: 2 business days

- Turnaround time on large projects for active clients: 4 business days

- Turnaround for new/larger client setups: 5 business days

- Consistent visual branding and alignment with creative briefs

- Completion of 30 project deadlines = bonus

- Strong internal collaboration and client feedback



Time Commitment & Logistics

- Part-time freelance role, with flexibility in hours

- Expected workload varies week to week, but timely response required for client-facing projects

- Remote work, ideally with some EST overlap for meetings or updates

- Weekly team check-ins via Slack or Google Meet



Ideal Candidate Profile

- Fast, focused, and quality-driven designer

- Adaptable to changing brand styles and timelines

- Thrives in a creative environment with autonomy

- Prior experience in hospitality or venue design is a major plus

Collaborative and innovative work environment.

ABOUT US

The MVMT Team at eXp Realty is one of NYC’s top-performing real estate teams, known for hustle, results, and culture. title: Video Editor (Performance Ads) – Sport / Knee Sleeve Brand
description:
Human Dynamix is a fast-growing performance brand focused on premium knee sleeves for athletes and runners. We create products that help people move better, train harder, and stay injury-free.



We are looking for a video editor who understands performance marketing — not just someone who can edit beautifully, but someone who knows how to create ads that convert.



You will be editing short-form video ads for Meta and TikTok using UGC, product footage, testimonials and training clips.

This is NOT cinematic YouTube editing.

This is fast-paced, high-retention, scroll-stopping ad editing.



What you’ll be doing:

- Edit 10–20 short-form ads per month (15–45 sec)

- Create multiple hook variations

- Add dynamic captions and subtitles

- Improve pacing, retention and watch time

- Test different angles (pain, performance, recovery, stability)

- Repurpose winning ads into new variations



We are looking for someone who:

- Has experience editing performance ads for e-commerce brands

- Understands hooks, retention and direct response structure

- Can work fast and iterate quickly

- Knows Meta and TikTok ad formats

- Has a portfolio of ad creatives that generated results

- Speaks and writes English fluently



Big plus if you:

- Have worked with running, sports or health brands

- Understand athletes / running culture / Hyrox

- Can also give creative input on scripts



This role can grow into a long-term collaboration if performance is strong.

title: Part-Time Bookkeeper & Accounts Coordinator
description:
Remote | £6 per hour | UK Construction Company



We are recruiting on behalf of a growing UK-based construction company seeking a detail-oriented and commercially aware Bookkeeper & Accounts Coordinator to support day-to-day financial operations.



This is a key position within the business. You will take ownership of the accounts function on a part-time basis — managing invoices, payment applications, supplier payments, and ensuring accurate financial records across the company’s internal system and QuickBooks.



You will work closely with the Director, providing regular cash flow updates and helping ensure smooth financial operations across multiple construction projects.



This is not just data entry — this is ownership and accountability.



Working Hours

10:00am – 2:00pm UK Time (Monday – Friday)

6:00pm – 10:00pm Philippines Time



Key Responsibilities



Client Invoicing & Payment Applications

Prepare and issue invoices to clients

Submit and manage construction payment applications (including certification process)

Upload invoices and applications to the company’s factoring provider

Ensure all financial records mirror correctly between the internal system and QuickBooks



Accounts Payable & Supplier Management



Upload supplier invoices to internal system and QuickBooks

Match invoices to purchase orders

Create purchase orders via internal system

Liaise with suppliers and client accounts teams

Prepare weekly payment summaries for Director approval

Process payments once approved



Cash Flow & Financial Reporting



Provide weekly cash flow updates

Assist with cash flow forecasting

Generate bi-weekly client statements

Chase overdue payments and maintain strong payment discipline



Essential Skills & Experience



Strong working knowledge of QuickBooks

Must have access to and experience using Microsoft 365

Experience in bookkeeping or accounts support

Confident managing invoices, purchase orders, and reconciliations

Comfortable communicating with UK clients and suppliers

Strong English (written and spoken)

Highly organised and detail-focused

Able to work independently and manage workload during UK hours



Highly Desirable (But Not Essential)



Experience in UK construction accounting

Familiarity with CIS (Construction Industry Scheme)

Experience handling payment applications in construction

Exposure to factoring / invoice finance processes

Training can be provided for the right candidate.



What We’re Looking For



Understands the importance of cash flow in construction

Can take ownership of processes

Is proactive in chasing payments

Communicates clearly and professionally

Is comfortable working directly with a Company Director



How to Apply



Use "Vixa Hire" in the subject line of your application

Send your resume and cover letter

Include your internet speed test result

We look forward to receiving your application.

title: Security Monitoring Representative
description:
PerVista AI is seeking dedicated, detail-oriented Security Monitoring Representatives based in Cebu to join our Security Operations team. In this critical role, you will be responsible for actively monitoring live video feeds and system alerts from client environments using the PerVista platform. Your primary focus will be to identify and respond to real-time firearm detection alerts and other security-related i
, ensuring timely escalation and resolution in accordance with established protocols.



Key Responsibilities

• Real-Time Monitoring: Continuously observe live video feeds across multiple client sites for suspicious activity or security threats, with a particular focus on firearm detection.

• Alert Management: Evaluate and verify AI-generated firearm alerts within the PerVista platform, ensuring accurate assessment and rapid response.

• I
 Response: Initiate appropriate responses based on severity and client-specific protocols, including escalation to emergency contacts or public safety agencies as required.

• Communication: Maintain clear, concise, and professional communication with internal teams, client contacts, and emergency responders when necessary.

• Documentation: Accurately log all i
, alerts, and resolutions in the PerVista i
 management system.
